24f5f782-19e1-4bc0-9c02-c3300753ad3b: A Hellknight's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are treated as {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good-aligned{/g} for the purpose of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
efff4d36-0698-46ae-b840-eb6430ae8693: A creature targeted by this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is held immobile by glowing golden chains composed of pure sunlight. For a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, the creature is paralyzed, held in place, and is dealt {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} plus 1 damage per caster level every round. It may attempt a new {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} each round to end the effect. If the initial saving throw is successful, the target is staggered for one round and is dealt the same amount of damage.
da0b6905-eab6-4910-b5a2-9eb93be4243d: A layer of acidic slime coats a babau's skin. Any creature that strikes a babau with a {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attack{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strike takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} from this slime if it fails a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 18 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g}. The save DC is {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}-based.
32191d4b-5621-43c7-8c27-2f8d2bb18020: A paralyzed character is frozen in place and unable to move or act. A paralyzed character has effective {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} scores of 0 and is {g|Encyclopedia:Helpless}helpless{/g}.
34864416-50f4-4eed-8c38-158cc38e6084: A rebel and a fighter for freedom and good, the Azata acts on instinct and trusts in spontaneous decisions. The Azata easily befriends those who don't fit into the neat ranks of the official crusade, and does not issue commands, but rather inspires allies to fight.
b9917b8b-30e9-4e42-b422-5e3689a29c1d:
A shambling mound's vines coil around any creature it hits with a slam {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. The shambling mound attempts a grapple {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} against its target, and on a successful check its vines deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g}+5 {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and the foe is grappled.
Grappled characters cannot move, and take a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on all attack rolls and a -4 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}. Grappled characters attempt to escape every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} by making a successful combat maneuver, {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility check{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this check is the shambling mound's {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}.
Each round, creatures grappled by a shambling mound suffer 4d6+10 damage.
A shambling mound receives a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on grapple maneuver checks.
b4259790-ac39-47a0-a934-0dfde7d13c68: Acrobatic movement to avoid {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} reduces your movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} despite the fact that the {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} is called {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}mobility{/g}. With this unlock this confusing problem is removed — acrobatic movement now instead increases your movement speed by half.
c6d11163-d594-4acb-b936-da7b5ff856e0: Add +2 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against spells from the Necromancy school of magic you cast.
6debf178-4b6e-4e98-821c-b61d603a0b9c: Additional {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} from Sword of Heaven are now maximized.
1daf5444-b4f2-4792-b37e-de40edae90cf: After consuming the angelic heart, you have become fearless and immortal. You gain immunity to death and fear effects.
44e836a1-ba50-40fc-b34e-0925a45226e5: All Lich's {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g}, including ones he makes in a polymorphed form, as well as melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed attacks{/g}, deal ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} + mythic rank) points of unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} as the target's flesh rots. The affected creature also suffers 1 point of {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} with each hit. Plant creatures take (2d6 + mythic rank) points of unholy damage.
eb248c1d-97f4-48b2-a488-74a5577077b0: All allies in a 20-foot radius gain immunity to diseases for 10 minutes.
3ec83115-006e-4551-82d8-d5a445032a68: All allies in a 20-foot radius gain immunity to fatigue, exhaustion, nauseated and sickened conditions, diseases, poisons, {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} and ability drain for 10 minutes.
feab15b2-cf2e-46b7-9a1f-40ac2834fda1: All allies in a 20-foot radius gain immunity to nauseated and sickened conditions, diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.
428f6aaa-70e3-47a2-b155-eb7255da79b6: All allies in a 20-foot radius gain immunity to nauseated and sickened conditions, diseases, poisons, {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} and ability drain for 10 minutes.
3ab98bcc-c0bc-4c49-b87f-8e18d7a61201: All allies in a 30-foot radius gain the combined effect of Avenger's Blessing, Mind Blank and Holy Sword {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} for one hour.
ec8d8277-5ef6-43de-bef6-593a9048c560: All allies in a 30-foot radius receive {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/-. Angel can activate his Sword of Heaven ability one more time per day.
0d85a9a9-e2e6-4357-9c68-f1048670941b: All demon's {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} of demons and count as having +2 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Additionally, all demon's natural {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} count as primary.
dae46889-0d72-4c54-9b4a-7fddc3f492ce: All demons in a 40-foot radius around the caster make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}. If it's failed, the demon is dealt 10 {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. If the saving throw is successful, the demon is dealt {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} damage per caster level.
e8cf5a44-c36a-4c9e-b91f-bcdd4fde1067: All enemies in a 30-foot radius make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}. If it fails, they become enraged, gaining {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} as from your Demonic Rage, but they also {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} the nearest target. The duration is 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, but affected enemies can make a saving throw each round to end the effect.
1d2ec80b-8fda-4c33-8139-56d2ca23850d: All enemies in a 50-foot radius are dealt {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d10{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per your mythic rank (half fire, half unholy). If after this damage their {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} is lower than ten times your mythic rank, they must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}. If they fail that saving throw, they die. Base DC to this saving throw is equal 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier.
40046f1d-9c09-4e9e-b46f-31e85ed9ecdd: All enemies in a 50-foot radius have to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}. If they fail it, they become enemies to everybody and start {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacking{/g} targets indiscriminately. Base DC to this saving throw is equal 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier.
94ff529e-6e7e-4b85-a8fb-ec470f238501:
All the healing {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} your allies cast restore 2 more points of damage per your mythic rank to all its targets. All spells cast by enemies who failed their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} suffer the same {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
Only one Primordial Magic gaze can be active at a time.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 penalty on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used (1 + your mythic rank) times per day.
7acef4e7-3bae-4697-bc25-414ea15df252:
All the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} your allies cast deal bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to your mythic rank to all targets. All the spells cast by enemies who failed their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} suffer the same {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
Only one Primordial Magic gaze can be active at a time.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 penalty on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used (1 + your mythic rank) times per day.
0baebac0-7e24-4d24-a3e8-9496dbbc7c0b:
All your allies become of Medium {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g}, lose all size {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}, but save all size {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} except {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g}. Your enemies who failed their saving throw become of Medium size, lose all size bonuses, but keep all size penalties.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the bonuses immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} to resist this effect, receiving a -2 penalty on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used (1 + your mythic rank) times per day.
d11c3050-8d6e-4309-bebc-cb197580ed99:
All your allies gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} equal to (1 plus one per two mythic ranks). All damage rolls made by your enemies who failed their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} suffer the same {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the bonuses immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 penalty on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used (1 + your mythic rank) times per day.
5276032e-068c-4ca6-b065-d99d66c144c0:
All your allies' {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} have their attack rolls increased by 1 plus one per two mythic ranks. All attack rolls made by your enemies who failed their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} suffer the same {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 penalty on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used 1 plus mythic rank times per day.
1838bfcb-9cd3-4ab5-891f-0c415c20be80: All your {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} are increased by 4. Your level cap has become 40 (you still can only get 20 levels in one character class), and the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:XP}XP{/g} needed to level up is drastically decreased.
54621d36-e99f-4dd7-8ca5-96c1b04dda99:
All {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} against you and your allies get a miss chance equal to 5% per your mythic rank. Whenever an attack you or your allies make would get a miss chance, it is reduced by 5% per your mythic rank.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used (1 + your mythic rank) times per day.
286064ad-69ba-45cb-a92e-c9f26eb526d8:
All {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} your allies cast have their {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} increased by 1 plus one per three mythic ranks. All spells and {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g} cast by your enemies who failed their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} have their caster level reduced by the same amount.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used 1 plus mythic rank times per day.
ffb62289-694d-470e-9619-85302aaa0ecb: Allows you to craft potions up to level 6 during {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}camping{/g}.
de190c12-a13c-4537-a070-dc8f4186a42e: An emissary of Hell vested with the power of law and evil, the Devil commands anything and everything imaginable through strength and sheer will.
62c660b2-0f8a-4583-81ed-b17aee62630d: An enemy has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} or be ensnared in tree roots. While in this state, the enemy cannot move, and has a 50% miss chance on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, as if all their opponents had total {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} enemy tries to pass another Reflex saving throw to break free. If the save fails, the enemy suffers ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} + half the Azata's {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g}.
7cd55a5e-d6e3-41b5-9612-26fad5c27b53: Angel can now imbue weapons of others with the same holy power. Angel can still imbue weapons of only one creature.
782e310f-17f8-4a0a-b07a-a8aa36951d80:
Angel's Halo now emanates an aura similar to the effect of holy aura {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
A brilliant divine radiance surrounds the subjects, protecting them from {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, granting them {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}resistance to spells{/g} cast by evil creatures, and causing evil creatures to become blinded when they strike the subjects. This abjuration has four effects.
First, each warded creature gains a +4 deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +4 resistance bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}. Unlike protection from evil, this benefit applies against all attacks, not just against attacks by evil creatures.
Second, each warded creature gains spell resistance 20 + Angel's mythic rank against evil spells and spells cast by evil creatures.
Third, the abjuration protects from all mind-affecting spells and effects.
Finally, if an evil creature succeeds on a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} against a creature warded by a holy aura, the offending attacker is blinded (Fortitude save negates, as blindness, but against holy aura's save ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} equal 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier)).
47991899-644c-4cc1-b1a4-5bcbc109968f:
Angels can imbue their weapons with holy power. Weapons imbued with holy power deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} holy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, while {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities used while holding imbued weapons deal an additional 2 dice of damage or {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} an additional 2 dice of damage.
You can use Sword of Heaven a number of times per day equal to 1 plus half your mythic rank.
a05443d4-5bed-491d-9b4e-288f16de0ae8: Any character can break free from entangling effects by succeeding on {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics check{/g}. But if you are strong enough – there is no actual difference between being entangled and suffering from any other debilitating condition. Every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} you attempt an Athletics {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to remove one negative condition affecting you. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this check is equal to the effect's original {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} DC + 15.
2649b01f-8914-4443-8761-bd8ced3b9fb9: Any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} targeting you during demonic rage has a 50% chance to miss.
d8278472-cbae-4a5e-9a8b-8e32cd733cb6: As a powerful Lich you can grant Rage powers to your Skeletal Champion. A skeletal champion gains the benefits of rage powers only while raging, and some of these powers require the skeletal champion to take an {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g} first. Unless otherwise noted, an individual power can't be chosen more than once.
6a4ce3bb-561d-4957-93e3-54cc24f258c4: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} once per day per growth point (minimum of 1/day), a nabasu can activate its {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}-stealing gaze for a full {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. All living creatures within 30 feet must succeed on a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 18 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} or gain a negative level. The save DC is {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g}-based.
dba94317-a194-46d8-a5d0-73bf9ce5600a: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, you can teleport to the target enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per mythic rank to all enemies in a 10-foot range around the beginning point of the teleport and at the end point. An enemy can only be damaged by this ability once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
5f2c0e49-ccc3-4122-b1e3-9ea2dd80b3b5: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} once per minute, a gallu can command the wounds of all creatures within 30 feet to erupt into a gory deluge of blood; any wounded creature in the area of effect immediately takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from the rain of blood and must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 31 {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}. Failure indicates that the damage becomes bleed damage and the affected creature becomes staggered from the pain as long as the bleed damage continues. Creatures that are immune to bleed damage are immune to this ability's effects. The save DCs are {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}-based.
122da963-7ed6-44a2-b8e5-6afa1ca5dd47:
As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, Aeon can attempt to suppress the effects of mythic powers of his enemies. This ability affects only mythic demons, who can oppose the power with a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}. Non-distorted mythic demons gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on this saving throw.
At 7th mythic rank, distorted mythic demons no longer get a saving throw to resist the effect, and non-distorted mythic demons don't get a bonus on the saving throw.
Starting at 9th mythic rank, mythic demons can't save against this ability.
Some mythic demons are immune to this ability.
2c5217c1-28f1-4ac8-9601-7718c84c1a1d: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, you grant all allies in 30ft radius the effects of the Edict of Impenetrable Fortress and Edict of Perseverance abilities for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
6c05ff99-05e7-435b-b729-7f13366655d0: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, you grant your target Invulnerability to any {g|Encyclopedia:Physical_Damage}physical damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}.
57589377-ef6c-4b0a-9fdd-a8b000d3f450: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, you make the enemy suffer from his {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g}. Every time the target {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, it is dealt ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} + half {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. Every time the target casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like ability{/g}, it is dealt (2d6 + caster level) damage. The effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per 4 caster levels.
fe816ca6-d762-445e-9bfc-7dfabefa55a1: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, you make the target {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} 11 on all d20 rolls for the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} divided by 4.
ea210c82-33c5-4898-8f17-2720b3246440: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, you order the enemy to stop all resistance. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}, it becomes dazed for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
a89a1dd9-34f1-4df5-8d36-807fbe4d595d: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, you suppress any negative mental or physical effects on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}.
b922f4b4-f491-4abe-87c9-982bd63f036c:
As long as you keep fighting, the power of your {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} keeps growing.
Benefit: Every turn, as long as you make at least one melee {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, you gain a stacking +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with melee weapons, up to a maximum of +10, that lasts until the end of combat.
0ec8c5fd-3c5d-4f51-84c2-c5148d869bda:
As you become a Devil, you gain the ability to issue Hell's Decrees a number of times per day equal to his mythic rank.
If a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} is involved, its {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} is 10 + double the devil's mythic rank.
a7856cb6-080f-4797-87be-825db5753b56: Aspect of Deskari makes all your {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}energy damage{/g} dealt while in demonic rage become Unholy, and your {g|Encyclopedia:Physical_Damage}physical damage{/g} ignores physical {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} immunity or {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
58e5dfb5-4118-4a50-8a97-ba383aedfc9c: Aspect of Kabriri allows you to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} every time you kill an enemy during demonic rage.
cdc1ce8a-7f95-4d84-83d3-0c8336721148: Aspect of Pazuzu makes your {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} 30 feet greater during demonic rage, and gives you one additional {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} (this effect stacks with haste).
2bf8277b-896c-42f9-926d-aa5d18828030: At 10th mythic rank, Aeon automatically {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} 20 on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} rolls and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against chaotic creatures. Additionally, his {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}energy resistance{/g} and immunities of chaotic enemies.
c9ceb485-9bfa-44f7-abe4-4cf80d924134: At 2nd, 4th, 6th, 8th, and 10th mythic ranks, an Angel can select an improvement to the Sword of Heaven ability. Improvements that are available at 8th and 10th ranks are significantly more powerful.
3859a266-f449-4d43-994e-cbbbc4b5bbce: At 3rd mythic rank, Aeon starts changing his own body and mind to remove impurities contained within. He gains immunity to poison, disease and confusion, and gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against chaotic enemies equal to his mythic rank.
ec92b1d0-9367-47e9-8b46-48fe980e3694:
At 3rd rank, Angel receives the ability to cast mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. He can either choose to take it as part of an existing full divine spellcaster spellbook, or as a standalone spellbook.
Standalone spellbook has an independent progression and spell slots. The number of its spell slots can't be increased with the Abundant Casting mythic feat.
In case of merging spellbooks the maximum caster level of the spells within it is 30, and you can use spell slots from the original spellbook to cast mythic spells. Raising the caster level makes spells more powerful. The number of spell slots can be increased with the Abundant Casting mythic feat. Spontaneous spellcasters get the new known spells from their original class and from mythic path independently: the original class's progression doesn't change, and every mythic rank increase gives additional known spells.
If you are multiclassing, it is recommended to use the standalone spellbook.
bbfae127-4158-4541-a2e6-9e8f62eb85b6: At 3rd rank, Azata gets a Dragon as an animal companion. Unlike normal animals of its kind, an animal companion's {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g}, abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} advance as the Azata gains mythic ranks.
7f08d60c-0647-4af8-98dc-d495bf6cf26b:
At 3rd rank, Lich receives the ability to cast mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. He can either choose to take it as part of an existing full arcane spellcaster spellbook, or as a standalone spellbook.
Standalone spellbook have independent progression and spell slots. The number of its spell slots can't be increased with the Abundant Casting mythic feat.
In case of merging spellbooks the maximum caster level of the spells within it is 30, and you can use spell slots from the original spellbook to cast mythic spells. Additional caster levels made spells more powerful. Original spellbook slots can be increased by Abundant Casting. For spontaneous spellcasters you will get new known spells from original class and from mythic independent: progression from original class will not change, but on mythic rank ups you will get additional known spells.
If you are multiclassing, it is recommended to use the standalone spellbook.
8a680e22-3385-49a7-898c-d2a09d9b9800:
At 4th rank, Aeon gains an ability to make his weapons and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} especially deadly against his enemies. For a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day equal to twice your mythic rank, you can make any weapon you wield count as having Bane quality, your spells gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to your mythic rank to {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, and every hit you make with weapons or spells dispel effects from the target, as per the dispel magic spell.
Additionally, if you have inquisitor's bane ability, the number of rounds per day stack, and you gain the same bonuses while using inquisitor's bane ability.
cbf1ef40-7fa0-48ce-ad00-ae88e0ac3531: At 5th mythic rank, Aeon gains immunity to bleed, mind-affecting effects and {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}.

At last, you notice the most important thing — problems within yourself. And to negate those problems, you learn to quickly find ways to use other mythic tricks.

At the 3rd rank, Aeon gains the ability to enforce rules on everything around them, giving various benefits to the allies and hindering the enemies. Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} to this saving throw is equal 10 + half your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier.
This ability can be used 1 plus mythic rank times per day.
dfd27b62-8be3-4398-883a-446da4c9c2cb: At the 9th mythic rank, Demon gains a Lord Demonic Aspect and another one on 10th mythic rank. These aspects use demon lords as inspiration and allow the Demon to focus the rage more effectively.

49610458-f366-4dcb-a885-b076a7cb79a5: For the Trickster, nothing is set in stone, because every stone can be smashed to pieces — if one is powerful enough. With every tweak and twist they make to the world, the Trickster shatters mundane understandings of reality, often simply for the fun of it.

da2777d4-0baf-4a1c-a907-db5bfd28bc33:
From now on, you are made of the Swarm. You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} of a swarm and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. You {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} increase by (4 plus your swarm {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g}). You gain immunity to most effects affecting a normal mortal body, such as poison, disease, paralysis and stun.
Additionally, while Swarm Form is active, all your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} deal additional (4 plus your swarm size) {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and any opponent that attacks you in melee combat is dealt (4 plus your swarm size) {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d6{/g} of damage.
9c14de5c-db1b-455a-841e-7c2b9013efef: Hallucinogenic Cloud creates a bank of fog like that created by fog cloud, except that the vapors are hallucinogenic. Creatures in the cloud become confused. This condition lasts as long as the creature is in the cloud and for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}+1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} after it leaves (roll separately for each confused character). Any creature that succeeds on its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} but remains in the cloud must continue to save each round. This is a mind-affecting effect.
19d3ea41-e547-497d-8d2e-5df4ccb81f7d:
If a character can catch an ally when they are unable to defend themselves effectively from her {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g}, she can heal a vital spot for extra healing.
The character's heal heals extra {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} anytime her target would be denied a {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} (whether the target actually has a Dexterity bonus or not), or when the character {g|Encyclopedia:Flanking}flanks{/g} her target. This extra healing is {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per die of your sneak {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. This additional healing is precision healing.
fa2cc22e-9dc9-48f2-800f-4c730ed417d2: If the target of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}, it is granted the grace of a bear, giving it a -8 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}.
8d9f4539-ebc9-4095-884a-3142cef5c61d:
In a dire situation, you can instantly make your way to a companion in danger and get them back into combat.
Benefit: Three times per day, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} you can teleport to an ally who has less than 30 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}. Until the end of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, your first {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} or ability is empowered and maximized, as though using the Empower Spell and Maximize Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}.
Empower Spell: All variable, numeric effects of an empowered spell are increased by half including {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving throws{/g} and opposed rolls are not affected, nor are spells without random variables.
Maximize Spell: All variable, numeric effects of a spell modified by this feat are maximized. Saving throws and opposed rolls are not affected, nor are spells without random variables.
c6d7e262-3024-4a34-b415-55b889623e1d: Instead of avoiding just {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}, you can now avoid normal {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} too. Every time you are hit by an attack you can attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}mobility check{/g} with a -10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. If the result is higher than the attacker's result, the attack misses.
28621060-016c-4802-9d51-4116280fcab6: Instead of just avoiding {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} by your acrobatic movements, you can instead make them yourself every time you avoid one. Enemies count as {g|Encyclopedia:Flat_Footed}flat-footed{/g} against those {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} — this is unexpected, after all.
5befe7a0-6c60-4e13-9def-2402ceb7b83c: Lich can change any elemental {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to negative energy, no matter what is the source of this elemental damage. 4d0bf2a0-a0e2-45c6-a646-21c99fcab9b7: Lich can enchant items he wears with bane living and nullifying {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special abilities{/g}. e4b7f4a3-cfd7-48b3-b454-2c45682fd460:
Lich gains a +4 profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and a +1 profane bonus per mythic rank to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against frightened creatures, or ones under any mind-affecting effects.
Additionally, all enemies within 10 feet of the Lich must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier) or become shaken until the end of combat. A successful save gives immunity to this ability for 24 hours.
1060012a-29da-4c6f-8c71-c3419f3aacc6: Lich gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/-. Whenever an enemy lands a hit on the Lich, that enemy becomes cursed with decaying muscles. Under this effect, the enemy suffers a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} until the end of the combat. Effects from multiple applications of this ability don't stack.
012b7feb-471f-4a02-b490-ca04a737e87c: Lich gains {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} 25 + mythic rank. Whenever an enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to overcome the Lich's {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} resistance, the next spell Lich would cast or next kinetic blast becomes quickened, as though using the Quicken Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} or Quicken Metakinesis.
8c670d06-2f4b-4578-a8e4-faac4208e9c1: Lich grants his animal companion all undead {g|Encyclopedia:Trait}traits{/g}, as well as {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/good and a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} 15.
d338926d-99b5-4e86-9384-276a81b33ea1: Lich, and all his companions in a 30-foot radius, cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} as if their {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} was 2 levels higher.
7f08200b-aae9-4021-aa9c-a9d89e42dcf5: Living creatures are also just complex devices and can also be easily disabled. You can try to disable them, forcing them to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 15 + your ranks in {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery{/g}). If the target fails it, it dies.
de7b39ea-c6f5-4af6-8bdc-6f1bfabd6db0: Magical effects do not differ much from magical traps, and can be disabled just like any device. You can, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, attempt a {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery check{/g} to dispel any effects on target or on the ground. Treat this as the dispel magic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, only with a {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} replaced by a Trickery {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} with a -10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
8109e12b-95b8-4a3f-9c03-89f06027cdd3: Multiple magical effects do not differ much from complex magical traps, and can be disabled together just like any device. You can, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, attempt to dispel all magic effects on the target or on the ground. Treat this a the greater dispel magic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, only with a {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} replaced by a {g|Encyclopedia:Trickery}Trickery{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} with a -20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
a991045c-fd32-4751-aa19-d6329a7e058d: Mythic Angel gains a celestial halo. Each ally within 50 feet of the Angel gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half Angel's mythic rank plus 1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made or effects created by evil creatures.
ae7518ef-05e3-4756-9262-33e1ab0d5105: Mythic Skill Focus — Use Magic Device
cf952e64-2fda-40bc-aa8a-fbe347255244: Mythic Tricksters can find creative uses for their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
373a0b70-214e-4f93-a012-7b566437296d:
Mythic characters that draw their power from Chaos gain an ability to create 3 illusionary copies of themselves. Those copies last for 1 minute per mythic rank and act like mirror image {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, protecting the character from {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}. Those characters can use this ability 3 times per day.
On the 2nd mythic rank, those characters become more creative, gaining a +3 circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
24a013d6-77be-4130-a658-28cc47af3d0c:
Mythic characters that draw their power from Freedom gain an ability to unleash a bolt of energy from Elysium itself, targeting an ally or a foe within 50 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. This bolt deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} plus 2d6 per mythic rank) points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to enemies. If used on allies, the bolt instead charges their {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with weapons for 2 + mythic rank {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. Companion's attacks with weapons deal an additional 2d6 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g} on hit and count as good for the purposes of bypassing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. Those characters can use this ability 3 times per day plus one extra time for each mythic rank beyond the first.
On the 2nd mythic rank, those characters become closer to the azatas that live in Elysium, gaining resist electricity 20 and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects.
9913a5c2-4e87-457b-9b78-9aec17fa7a00:
Mythic characters that draw their power from Good gain an ability to unleash a ray of heavenly light, targeting an ally or a foe within 50 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. This ray {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} allies for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} plus 2d6 per mythic rank points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} or deals the same amount of damage to enemies. Those characters can use this ability 3 times per day plus one extra time for each mythic rank beyond the first.
On the 2nd mythic rank, those characters become closer to angels, gaining resist acid 20, resist cold 20, and an immunity to petrification.
962d8de9-8302-4808-a06c-6af3379100d1:
Mythic characters that draw their power from Law gain an ability to force reality upon the enemies around. Every enemy in 30 feet radius around the mythic character is affected by a greater dispel magic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} effect, affecting only the effects of the Illusion school.
The {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} for this ability is equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} plus your mythic rank.
11e4944f-d461-4876-b8d0-4a7a1e4c6c9c:
Mythic characters that draw their power from Law gain an ability to force reality upon the enemies around. Every enemy in 30ft radius around the mythic character is a target of greater dispel magic spell effect, affecting only abilities of Illusion school.
On the 2nd mythic rank, the mythic character gains the ability to fix hindering abnormalities in his allies. One ally in close range is target to greater dispel magic spell effect affecting all negative effects.
The {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} for these abilities is equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} plus mythic rank. You can use them 3 plus mythic rank times per day.
450b68d9-26c1-4482-a332-df8de25a2433:
Mythic characters that draw their power from the Abyss grow a pair of horns, gaining a gore {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. This attack is made with a -5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} and deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} plus 1-1/2 times their {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g}. It counts as cold iron and magic for the purposes of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
On the 2nd mythic rank, those characters become closer to demons, gaining resist electricity 20 and an immunity to poisons.
782f7631-eac9-428a-943a-9f0f0909eda5:
Mythic characters that draw their power from {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g} can channel negative energy to deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to living creatures or to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} undead creatures.
Channeling energy causes a burst that either heals all undead creatures or damages all living creatures in a 30-foot radius centered on the mythic character. The amount of damage dealt or healed is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} plus 1d6 per mythic rank. Creatures that take damage from channeled energy receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to halve the damage. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this save is equal to 10 + mythic rank + the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier (whichever is higher). Creatures healed by channel energy cannot exceed their maximum hit point total: all excess healing is lost. A character may channel energy a number of times per day equal to 3 + mythic rank. This is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} that does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}.
On the 2nd mythic rank, those characters gain an even greater mastery of negative energy. Their insight into the flows of negative energy also gives them an advantage in combat against enemies that have an affinity to negative energy, such as the undead or the Nabasu demons.
These characters become immune to negative levels and gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on saving throws against death effects. They gain a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, saving throws, weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and damage rolls against creatures with negative energy affinity. The DCs of their class abilities against these opponents increase by 2.
9fc7d695-41e6-4384-8dff-52a9d824201e: Nothing can escape your notice. You automatically detect creatures who attempt to use {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g}. You also notice more about yourself and your companions, allowing both them and you from now on to take {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} from a special trickster list: Metamagic (Completely Normal Spell), Improved Improved Critical, Stat Focus.
c7894185-266d-421d-a500-b9f123c0947c: Now, at last, you can call yourself really strong. The most athletic athlete in the world! And, as such, your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} can't be low — not lower than your ranks in {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g}. And if your base {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g}, it becomes not less than your ranks in Athletics plus 5.
0b7fefa2-1c1e-48f6-8290-1c1976d480fa: On the 2nd mythic rank, mythic characters that draw their power from Chaos become more creative, gaining a +3 circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
75e6a932-ed15-44c7-9630-ad019e7fbcec: On the 2nd mythic rank, mythic characters that draw their power from Freedom become closer to the azatas that live in Elysium, gaining resist electricity 20 and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects.
284d41ac-5806-406d-abe8-f82b0ca76279: On the 2nd mythic rank, mythic characters that draw their power from Good become closer to angels, gaining resist acid 20, resist cold 20, and an immunity to petrification.
a93fbaea-0a5c-47ee-9670-457d011bb54d: On the 2nd mythic rank, mythic characters that draw their power from the Abyss become closer to demons, gaining resist electricity 20 and an immunity to poisons.
45d01924-1604-4a21-a4b5-10a2cbad245a:
On the 2nd mythic rank, mythic characters that draw their power from {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g} gain an even greater mastery of negative energy. Their insight into the flows of negative energy also gives them an advantage in combat against enemies that have an affinity to negative energy, such as Undead or Nabasu demons.
These characters become immune to negative levels and gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against death effects. They gain a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, saving throws, weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} against creatures with negative energy affinity. The DCs of their class abilities against these opponents increase by 2.
962e27e1-4b5b-4862-8709-667ecb76cfd9: On the 2nd mythic rank, the bodies of the mythic characters that draw their power from Law become less vulnerable. They gain resist cold 20 and when a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} or sneak {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} is scored on the them, there is a 25% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is instead {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolled{/g} normally.
47d0d02b-306f-475a-9a40-470171db18d2:
Once every {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, a vavakia can breathe out a 60-foot cone of green fire that seems to writhe and coil with the tortured shapes of a thousand screaming ghosts. This green fire comprises countless souls the vavakia has consumed, and these vomited souls consume flesh as surely as they consume sanity. A creature struck by this breath weapon takes 20d6 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (Reflex {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 30 half) as the raw profane power blackens and melts its flesh and skin. Evil creatures take half damage from the breath weapon, but good creatures that failed {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} from a vavakia's breath weapon are staggered for 1 round by the excruciating sensation. In addition, any living creature that failed Reflex save from a vavakia's breath weapon must also succeed at a DC 30 Fortitude save or take 1d8 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} drain as its sanity slips away into madness.
Immediately after the vavakia expels this green soulfire, the wailing flames flow in reverse into the demon's gullet through its open maw. This restores 1d8 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} to the vavakia for each creature that was damaged by its breath weapon.
The Wisdom drain element of this breath weapon is a mind-affecting effect. The save DC is {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}-based.
45de6634-80df-4d03-a6ae-9672e9956a4f: Once every {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, havoc dragon deals 2d10 points of sonic damage to everyone in a in 30-foot cone. This damage increases by 2d10 for every Azata mythic rank.
1508a175-1cec-44ba-b122-89b6da94a542: Once per demonic rage, you can use this ability to grant one ally all the benefits of the demonic rage, including effects of your active aspects and major aspects as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g} until the end of combat.
7f436f6d-f0aa-498a-8e3a-bd823c644b1f:
Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, after your ally misses an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, they {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}reroll{/g} it and keep the better result. Once per round, after an enemy who had failed the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} makes an attack and hits, they must reroll this attack and keep the worse result.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used (1 + your mythic rank) times per day.
e24296d5-c58a-4a43-8c29-f8de776a5e19: One ally goes into battle madness. Until the end of combat, the ally {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} enemies indiscriminately, but gains a number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to ten times your mythic rank. Additionally, each time this ally kills a target, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/good, +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against movement impairing, paralyzing and stunning effects until the end of combat. This bonus stacks up to 5 times.
8b860693-c36a-4945-88c3-142f702fedf7: One ally is ordered to only use one {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}school of magic{/g}, but the potency of their {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} increases considerably. {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}Caster level{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against this ally's spells is increased by half your mythic rank.
d21244d2-f18a-470b-8b52-fd26d9103b5f: One doesn't need to be a mythic creature, an otherworldly being, or a deity's chosen to become a hero. This path may be grueling and full of temptation, but the mortal who treads it fully earns the right to call themselves a true Legend.
d82b5475-2168-4fd5-b1fc-082cf834c501: Select one {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}school of magic{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from your {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} and mythic feats that apply to another school of magic, such as Spell Focus feat and School Mastery mythic feat, now apply to the chosen school of magic too.
8be79af8-6de6-4b14-968a-a56f3bcf9df6: Select one {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}school of magic{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast that belong to this school have their {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} increased by 1.
805368ce-b972-4b3b-9166-6d33738f76dd:
Some people motivate their companions by their mere presence, while you learnt that pain is a much more potent motivator.
Benefit: Every time you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} an ally, they gain a +2 mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and damage {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}, and a +1 mythic bonus on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. The bonuses last for a number {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to half your mythic rank.
15e812a7-8397-40d0-8e72-28922e228492: Song of Courageous Defender — Choose Companion
49e1b6a9-f6ff-4c12-b752-f817a6e5749d:
Starting at 6th mythic rank, Aeon can simultaneously activate two gazes.
At 10th mythic rank, the number increases to three gazes.
579ff634-559d-44de-bf6a-5489675e1600: Starting at the 4th mythic rank and every rank thereafter, Demon gains a Demonic Aspect. These aspects use other Demons as inspiration and allow the Demon to focus the rage more effectively.
eff530ca-9f68-4fde-83ff-d5cbe252e386: Summon Azata Ghaels and Astral Devas
4fd5aedd-7ff5-40dc-8f60-b667eb28867d: Sword of Heaven now lasts for 1 minute per mythic rank.
f505125d-40cc-4539-90e0-6e2e8b6117dd: Target's bones explode in the body. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}, it receives 6 {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, and all creatures in a 20-foot radius receive {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} damage per caster level (Reflex save halves). If the Fortitude saving throw is successful, the target receives 1d6 damage per caster level, and all creatures in a 20-foot radius receive 1 damage per caster level instead (Reflex save halves).
8dfcadea-c71f-4358-8169-58b8cd2a5613: Target's main weapon becomes +5 Living Bane weapon for one {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per mythic rank as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
ba45ca23-930f-40c8-8ca6-80184c70b027: The Aeon is the embodiment of law and order and possesses the power to correct abnormalities in the fabric of time and reality itself. Nothing can escape the Aeon's scrutinizing gaze and impartial judgment.
5b47dffc-d55b-4079-9b2c-92ec89fbdb38: The Angel is a mighty champion of good who sets a shining example for the crusaders, smiting demons with a sword of holy flame. Those who fight alongside the Angel can be certain that they will be protected, {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g}, and even resurrected in the event of their untimely demise.
c1a55049-4a14-4a4b-b5fc-0967d46650a4: The Demon gains a tail slap {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. If used as part of a full attack {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}, the tail slap attack is made at the Demon's full {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} –5. If the tail slap hits, it deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (assuming the Demon is Medium; 1d4 points of damage if Small) plus half the Demon's {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier.
bd5cd979-998c-4c14-9655-8cf0c7a85745: The Demon is the epitome of rage; a little push is all that is needed to break their self-control and turn them into a force to be feared — by enemies and friends alike. It is up to the Demon to decide whether to allow their inner beast to take control, or to fight it, chain it, and bring it to heel.
012a8b9d-29f9-415e-9988-7e8c06e3704b:
The Devil gains the ability to place Hell's Seals on allies. They activate when certain conditions are met.
You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your mythic rank, but only one seal can be placed on a single ally at one time.
6a19d980-b1a8-48b5-b88d-671c0d3bf31b:
The Gold Dragon gains immunity to cold, fire, electricity and acid, energy drain and negative energy. All your {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is now {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}.
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} dealing damage now change their dice to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d10{/g}, if it was not d10 or greater. If it was d10 or greater, the spell instead plus one {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage per die.
Bonus to your highest ability score increases to +8.
11bff979-4976-4395-91f3-25d2f02f3624:
The Gold Dragon gains immunity to mind-affecting effects and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 15 plus your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} and half your mythic rank.
If your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} is less than 15 plus mythic rank, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} up to that number.
All {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} become class skills for you. If you have less ranks in a skill than your mythic rank, you gain a bonus up to that number.
If any of your attributes before modifiers is less than 18, you gain a bonus up to that number.
Bonus to your highest ability score increases to +6.
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} now change their dice to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d8{/g}, if it was not d8 or greater. If it was d8 or greater, the spell instead plus one bonus to damage per die.
54348153-bd1a-4135-ac55-284c0814b69c:
The Gold Dragon gains immunity to poison, disease, fear, confusion, paralysis and sleep. He also gains resistance to all energies equal to (his {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} plus half his mythic rank).
If any of your {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} before modifiers is less than (5 + your mythic rank), you gain a bonus up to that number.
If any of your attributes before modifiers is less than 14, you gain a bonus up to that number.
Your highest ability score gets a +4 bonus.
All your {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}hit dice{/g} are now {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d12{/g}.
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} now change their dice to d6, if it was not d6 or greater. If it already was d6 or greater, instead the spell deals one additional point of damage per dice rolled.
All your weapons count as +5 weapons.
6f58cf47-7062-43d7-b7ff-9c5d226383fa: The Gold Dragon is a mighty, almost omnipotent creature that possesses powers beyond all others. The Gold Dragon is the embodiment of goodness, hope, and redemption.
a809f3b0-2240-4c95-aac9-3aa83a6a4dd9: The Legend's powers are beyond the abyssal corruption's reach. The Legend and all companions can {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g} up to 5 times after the Legend had cleared all the corruption from themselves at a safe place.
7f440b63-3a07-41fb-afd3-65d9963094e7: The Swarm has only one desire — to devour everyone and everything in its path. There are no friends or foes, enemies or allies, dear ones or despised ones — only food.
efb066fc-8233-465b-bf48-f1238970f9bd:
The bigger they are, the easier they are to hit for your ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on your attack {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} with ranged weapons, equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} the target receives from their {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} (if any).
864953f3-bee6-4ec6-8991-18be137faf9f:
The creatures you summon gain a piece of your mythic power.
Benefit: Creatures summoned by you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} equal to half your mythic rank plus 1. Their {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} now ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} except N/-.
aeaf7272-a32b-48a2-9ea4-7426c3f0050b: The demon can grow claws at will, gaining two claw {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}. These attacks are considered primary attacks and are made at the demon's full {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g}. The claws deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing damage{/g} (1d6 if Small) plus the demon's {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier. If one of the claws is used in concert with a weapon held in the other hand, the claw attack is made at the demon's full base attack {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} –5 and deals 1d8 {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} plus half the demon's Strength modifier.
3694e627-8937-4fb0-b63f-e21c8d0c0646: The loss of bodily strength is the high price you pay for becoming a lich.
95e4b7e0-1c58-48cf-9b0d-a88266c5f4a8:
The mythic character gains the ability to fix hindering abnormalities in their allies. One ally in close range is affected by the effect of the Greater Dispel {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, affecting all negative effects.
The {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} for this ability is equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} plus mythic rank.
6958552d-39db-4d1e-8bb5-466f46f6654e:
The owner of the imbued weapon now is under effect similar to Haste, but granting 2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} and making all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} of level 7 or lower quickened, as though using the Quicken Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
Quicken Spell: Casting a quickened spell is a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}. You can perform another {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}, even casting another spell, in the same {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as you cast a quickened spell. A spell whose {g|Encyclopedia:Casting_Time}casting time{/g} is more than 1 round or 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g} cannot be quickened.
91f361cc-c94c-464d-83ba-6d6d5b9c12fd:
The path to becoming a legend is a long and difficult one, but after you become one — you will be the pinnacle of what a mortal can become.
All your {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} will be increased by 4. Your level cap will become 40 (you still can only get 20 levels in one character class), and the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:XP}XP{/g} needed to level up will be drastically decreased.
b7761b7e-9ef3-433c-9264-6b89a559b9fb:
The power of the Abyss courses through the Demon waiting to be unleashed. The Demon can enter a demonic rage as a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}free action{/g}. The demonic rage lasts until the end of combat. While in demonic rage, the Demon gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} and Reflex saving throws. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} for all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against Demon's {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities are increased by 2. These benefits increase by 1 at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.
You can use Demonic Rage 3 times per day. Number of uses increases by 1 at 6th and 9th mythic ranks.
100ed9a4-9209-42f4-89db-b09988e83c67:
The skeletal champion gets Dirge of Doom, Lingering Performance as well as the following minor bardic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}:
1st level spells — cause fear, ear-{g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} scream, touch of gracelessness, vanish, feather step
2nd level spells — blindness, scare, mirror image, heroism, sound burst
3rd level spells — crushing despair, haste, confusion, slow
4th level spells — freedom of movement, dominate person
e4a15015-c223-40ab-8ec3-a43dc24a9dff: The skeletal champion gets Magus class abilities, such as arcane pool, {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} combat, and the minor magus spells, which include all spells from the Magus list up to level 3.
2befffdb-9702-4817-9f3b-18a7ea887952: The skeletal champion gets an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} combat {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, armor training, weapon training, and its {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}BAB{/g} now equals is full HD instead of the regular 3/4 HD.
dcf821b6-e7d1-4c10-bcf5-4338f26fe954: The skeletal champion gets barbarian's Rage ability and fast movement, as well as 2 rage powers on Lich choice.
5e0657c9-f260-4713-b3a9-17fcaedce48f: The skeletal champion gets channel negative energy, using its HD instead of cleric class for calculations, domains of {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}Death{/g} and Destruction, and all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} from the Cleric list.
8eb16123-6f2b-4211-831a-013dc6c41410:
The skeletal champion gets inquisitor's judgment twice per day, bane, a teamwork {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} and the following Inquisitor {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}:
1st level spells — bane, bless, cause fear, doom, stunning barrier
2nd level spells — boneshaker, castigate, hold person, inflict moderate wounds, remove paralysis
3rd level spells — fester, heroism, inflict serious wounds, litany of entanglement, prayer
4th level spells — inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} wounds, unholy blight
5dc2b7e1-f56e-4385-ad7a-3006a9588144: The skeletal champion gets inquisitor's judgment twice per day, bane, and teamwork {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
9534e492-2711-47aa-a021-23d72f0712e6: The sound of a derakni in flight is a mesmerizing, unsettling drone that causes confusion in all non-demons who hear the sound. A derakni can activate this ability once per 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. Any non-demon creature within 30 feet of a derakni must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} or become confused for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} rounds. A creature that makes this save is immune to the drone of that derakni for 24 hours. Demons are immune to this sonic, mind-affecting effect.
2e6031a6-bf53-423b-b026-f76ff39874d7:
The sound of your blows is powerful enough to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} even without {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} through enemy defenses.
Benefit: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, when your {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} misses the target, you deal ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} plus 1d6 per two mythic ranks) {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} to all enemies in 10-feet radius.
d5fb8e7a-5d6a-47bd-ad33-c460bf95c25f: The target gains immunity to diseases for 10 minutes per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
26b10a1b-fc50-43ff-b00a-f95a108c8ac3: The target gains immunity to fatigue, exhaustion, nauseated and sickened conditions, diseases, poisons, {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} and ability drain for 10 minutes.
cded7d55-9228-4a26-8a2a-6b420baf8236: The target gains immunity to nauseated and sickened conditions, diseases and poisons for 10 minutes per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
d4de13c2-68c0-4a11-b1de-cce0bcd1ce72: The target gains immunity to nauseated and sickened conditions, diseases, poisons, {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g} and ability drain for 10 minutes.
6e467ca4-b7b5-43f1-b728-08951247d657: The target is {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g} plus {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} plus additional 1d8 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} for every dead creature in a 30-foot radius.
0b991748-16e9-42dd-8593-a88072af1898: The target suffers a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}.

cd21308e-269a-4da3-8a17-99b987c8e9ef: The ultimate ruler of undeath, the Lich is a being who has transcended the narrow confines of life itself. Powerful beyond imagining, the Lich can create limitless hordes of undead to remake the world to fit their vision.
9b2d0759-711c-4812-9206-0279ed72d87a:
The wounds you inflict with your {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} are anything but natural.
Benefit: Your natural {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} now ignore all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} except N/-.
8eda9f6b-92f9-4127-a316-2726761b8fc3:
The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} your allies cast is increased by 1 plus one per three mythic ranks. The DC of saving throws against all spells and {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g} cast by your enemies who failed their saving throw is reduced by the same amount.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used 1 plus mythic rank times per day.
ba3f586e-1862-444c-a191-1904b0426adc:
The {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} you deal with your chosen weapon is truly awesome to behold.
Benefit: When using your chosen weapon, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on damage {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}. This stacks with the bonus from Weapon Specialization and Greater Weapon Specialization.
8d7f54e1-636d-49d2-b12d-8593b92b2231:
There is no escape for any mortal soul.
This spell works as repurpose spell, except the duration is permanent. The target is immediately dealt 1d6 unholy damage per two caster levels (Fortitude save negates), and then 1d6 unholy damage per caster level every round until its death. If the target dies during the effect, it is revived after death as an undead creature under your command.
