For three {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, the target ally always {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} 20 on all d20 rolls.
408d30f1-21e7-46a1-b686-a29bab3df69a: When the {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} of the ally drops below 5×mythic rank, they immediately die, dealing all enemies in a 30-foot radius {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d10{/g}×mythic rank {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (half fire, half unholy) in the process.
eb34061a-5b93-4dc6-a92e-e01cbd4dc0e0: When you cast this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, you open all the reality around you to a glimpse of the inevitable {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}. All living creatures within 80 feet from you take 10 {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} negative levels. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} negates the damage.
7188acd8-39aa-4d13-ae22-e195fb6ed453: When your ally is making a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} against an Illusion or Enchantment {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, they automatically succeed. Additionally, the caster is then targeted by the same effect, with the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of its saving throw increased by a number equal to half your mythic rank.
787275c5-fa7b-4c42-b878-54e11298d288: When your ally's {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} drops below 15×your mythic rank, the seal deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} per your mythic rank {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (half fire, half unholy) to all enemies, and they must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} or start burning for 2d6 (half fire, half unholy) damage each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. Base DC to this saving throw is equal 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier.
5c8485eb-9c3c-4af0-9534-627d9262adda:
When your shots hit the target, they do truly devastating {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
Benefit: When you use Deadly Aim, you gain a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on ranged damage {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} instead of +2. When your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} reaches +4, and every +4 thereafter, the bonus on ranged damage rolls increases by +3 rather than +2.
3af54b38-aa81-40ac-9d9e-3ee0e1962935: When {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} is dealt to your ally, they are {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} for ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} per mythic rank) {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g}, and their {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} deal additional 2d6 unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} for the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your mythic rank.
5e7b9ff9-28da-43f9-ad59-b8f2d4d88483: Whenever Angelic Halo is active, all allies in the 50-foot area get a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to fire, cold, acid and electricity resistances equal to 5 per Angel's mythic rank, and a bonus to sonic and negative {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}energy resistance{/g} equal to 3 per Angel's mythic rank, as well as a bonus to force, unholy, holy and divine resistance equal to Angel's mythic rank.
3c60f3eb-475f-4f85-b290-4095d6e54e70: Whenever Angelic Halo is active, all demons and undead creatures in the 50-foot area suffer ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} + mythic rank) points of holy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
886fda7b-4998-4f8f-be25-5c954e3acc9b: Whenever Angelic Halo is active, all enemies in a 50-foot area suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 1 + half the Angel's mythic rank, as well as a penalty to all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to the half the penalty to spell resistance.
c1295e7c-1348-4582-88d5-284e28ae1a72: Whenever Angelic Halo is active, an enemy that {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} the Angel first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier) or be blinded for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}+1 round. On a successful saving throw, the enemy becomes dazzled for 1 minute.
13b2678e-cc40-4306-b7a7-a3cce952669f: Whenever Angelic Halo is active, the Angel doesn't suffer any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from the allies' {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} that have an area of effect. If Angel is the main target of such a spell, it becomes empowered, as though using the Empower Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, and the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against it is increased by 2.
62cae637-6631-4609-af4f-d2f9dd7d8649: Whenever Azata casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that targets individual creatures, not areas, the spell affects one additional creature within a 30-foot range from the target. If the target is an enemy, the spell affects one additional enemy; if the target is an ally, the spell affects one additional ally. Additionally, spells that target enemies {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} them for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} + mythic rank.
893d50c7-5e34-44c4-a26a-d8a2c1c255b4: Whenever Lich activates this ability, all of his kineticist blasts and alchemist bombs deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} negative {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}energy damage{/g} + 1 point per mythic rank and inflict a negative level upon the target.
ca84acf8-0596-4516-abdd-afc4a7637293: Whenever Lich charges or uses any {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g}, on a successful hit or maneuver, the enemy suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per Lich's mythic rank, as their bones shake from the impact.
b2018e37-6c3b-49bc-8e32-1290688186c9:
Whenever Lich lands a successful sneak {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, the enemy must pass {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier + mythic rank) or become tainted. The tainted creature is vulnerable to all weapon and elemental {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, as well as suffers a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on all attack {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} and weapon damage rolls, until the end of the combat.
Additionally, Lich's sneak attack damage is increased by 1d6.
15c3600d-4258-4bde-b93d-cd7cf06ffeca: Whenever Sword of Heaven is active, this ability allows the Angel to transform all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt by the Angel into {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}.
c64f2845-0b3e-4372-86d5-69463dc03773:
Whenever an ally makes an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g}, or a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g}, and gets a result equal to or less than (1 + half your mythic rank), this result instead becomes (2 + half your mythic rank). Whenever an enemy who had failed their saving throw makes an attack roll, skill check, or a saving throw, and gets a result higher than (21 — half your mythic rank), this result instead becomes (20 — half your mythic rank).
This ability has a lower saving throw {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} than your other gazes, equal to (15 + your mythic rank).
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used (1 + your mythic rank) times per day.
3dffdfbf-a08b-45eb-8836-d7c58723df6f: Whenever an opponent with fewer hit dice than the dragon comes within a 30-foot range of the dragon, they must make a Will saving throw. If it fails, the opponent becomes shaken (or, if they have less than 5 hit dice, panicked) for 5d6 rounds. A successful saving throw makes the creature immune to this dragon's Frightful Presence for 24 hours. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.
604f7a44-d075-4ab4-a243-d2c3f5d19a1d:
Whenever the Demon would become paralyzed, frightened, cowering, or stunned, they instead fall into an uncontrolled rage for an equal duration. The Demon gains immunity to the effects of dazed, paralyzed, petrified, frightened, cowering, sleeping, stunned, and confused conditions as well as other movement- and {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}-impairing effects. The Demon's {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} becomes equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g}, and their {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} becomes equal to double their mythic rank + 16. The Demon gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} equal to double their mythic rank + 10, a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} ability scores, and a +4 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}. All of the Demon's weapons deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} as if two {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} categories larger than they actually are.
While in an uncontrolled rage, the Demon can't tell friend from foe: the Demon loses control of themselves and {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} the nearest creature.
541bf09a-cb51-4350-a4c3-6ff4a707a4c7: Whenever the angel activates the Sword of Heaven ability, it restores him 10 HP, heals all ability damage and removes the following negative conditions: blind, confused, dazed, dazzled, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, nauseated, poisoned, sickened, stunned. It also dispels the effects of the feeblemind spell and ecorche's Seize Skin ability.
c58965c6-62ca-4783-9b18-bbe867109e0f: Whenever you hit the target with a melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}, it makes a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}. If it is successful, the target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. If the saving throw failed, the damage is increased to 3d6 damage per caster level. If the damage kills the target, you regain 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} per caster level.
d9588daf-6ca6-4a4b-a812-563f9a98327c: Whenever you miss with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, the target still takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. This damage cannot be increased by any other means.
007286c2-014c-42c5-aaa6-12d861fbd67d:
Whether you channel energy to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} or kill, it's especially potent.
Benefit: When you channel energy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} you heal or deal increases by a number of points equal to twice your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
b164b811-2e7c-41c7-bcd9-302defcde6e4: While Angelic Halo is active, whenever an ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, they receive fast {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} equal to Angel's mythic rank for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
cb2dfb82-1313-4eeb-8a10-29bbb1d21985:
With greater potency and frequency, your fists stun those who stand against you.
Benefit: The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of your Stunning Fist increases by half your mythic rank.
2665c626-639f-4f3e-a326-8bbf613de363: With the perfect prediction, a creature can foresee an attack before it happens. This effect grants a +2 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to the creature's armor class. This bonus increases by 1 for every six {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}.
0fb74e32-bc4d-40b9-8602-47aa534a9ae3: With this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, Azata chooses to create one of 5 possible 10-feet rainbow domes. While within it, party members get immunity either to fire, to cold, to acid, to electricity or sonic {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} by her choice.
f730f5e3-4cc3-4200-98ea-8eab043d91d2:
With weapons in both hands, your deft strikes make you twice as deadly.
Benefit: Your {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} for fighting with two weapons are reduced by 2.
4ba33488-98c8-470a-8b24-78260d264e79: Xanthir Vang's magic has made the Aeon's Mythic Suppression ability stronger. Whenever the aeon uses it, the target additionally gets a -2 penalty to AC and a -5 penalty to spell resistance. From the 7th mythic rank on, these penalties increase to -4 to AC and -10 to spell resistance.
6cf7e8a2-a144-4867-a4ca-be73d9820b37: You already can break free from continuous conditions. But if you are strong enough — there is little difference between continuous and instantaneous. Every time you fail a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g}, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}athletics check{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} equal to the original save DC + 20. If you succeed, you automatically pass the saving throw.
709d136b-4748-4cd4-9811-87ce760dec5e:
You are a beacon of hope for your comrades, and they perform better near you.
Benefit: Your allies within 50 feet of you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank plus 1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects, and their {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g}.
f7fdc50c-1b3f-4797-9301-e12ef5afa9f3:
You are a master of the hideous laughter {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
Benefit: When a creature fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} against your hideous laughter spell, another random enemy within 30 feet of the target is affected by the same spell. This chain continues as long as targets continue to fail their saving throws.
aef2a5c5-1e21-44ae-87f2-a3175400b464:
You are a master of the mage armor {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
Benefit: Whenever you cast mage armor on yourself, it gives an additional armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to your mythic rank.
8bfdd8dc-2325-4f03-8200-d336e052b223:
You are a paragon of your sorcerous bloodline.
Benefit: You immediately gain an ability from the 20th level of your bloodline.
fba2f251-cddc-4321-9a10-ef6fac6df295:
You are able to channel your mythic powers into invigorating and coordinating your allies.
Benefit: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can enter a state of Battle Meditation. While in this state, you are unable to move, lose your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and count as being staggered. All allies in a 30-foot radius gain a morale bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fear effects equal to one plus one per three mythic ranks.
5da32491-1f62-49be-ae73-8c51b6a36830:
You are always ready to unleash some extra {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
Benefit: Whenever you make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on the attack {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage roll{/g} equal to your mythic rank. The number of attacks of opportunity you can make each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} is increased by two.
6e9af387-7c1e-4570-b21f-6f4c279e0b04: You are nauseated. Additionally, if you die, you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}6d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to all creatures in a 15-foot radius and apply Corrupted Blood to them.
9c1ba4d9-5c4e-44ba-aa29-78d306783d4a: You are so good at demoralizing enemies that just entering combat against you is enough to demoralize them. Any enemy that begins combat against you is immediately affected by your demoralize ability.
041f694c-afb0-4340-878a-7b257088d9db: You are so good at demoralizing your enemies that they lose the will to fight completely. Enemies affected by your demoralize ability must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of 10 + your ranks in {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g}, or become paralyzed and completely {g|Encyclopedia:Helpless}helpless{/g}. They may make another saving throw against this condition every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
e704aa72-ee06-453e-bf33-c69fa02ad787: You are so good at demoralizing your enemies that they lose the will to live. Enemies that fail their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} against your demoralize ability must spend their first {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} making a Coup de Grace against themselves.
03cc2a03-7a8d-48e7-ba6d-6b3f23a159c4:
You become The Swarm.
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} are increased by 4 plus your swarm {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g}, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 25 plus your swarm size, and you gain immunity to most harmful conditions.
You are also immune to exhaustion and fatigue effects. Your swarm form grants you a +10 profane bonus on Stealth skills checks for Camouflage role and a +10 profane bonus on Perception skill checks for Night Watch during rest and movement on global map.
8a1cc826-e201-4e1d-a6d0-a45062592016:
You become a Host of the Great Swarm, which now lives inside your body. This symbiosis gives you Fast {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Healing{/g} and additional {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} depending on the {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} of the swarm.
To increase the size of the swarm you need to devour other living beings.
5c43af1c-5932-49f6-afee-9d53fcab50ac: You blast your enemies with a stream of halberds. You fire one halberd per two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}. Each halberd requires a {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attack{/g} to hit and deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier) {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
c0c4badf-8418-4aaa-90b4-f3ce6f01f065: You breathe out a blast of coins. Creatures in the affected area take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} per mythic rank. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} halves the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
fd343e99-0f61-42d9-a142-199d1383626c: You bring special favor upon yourself and your allies while bringing disfavor to your enemies. You and each of your allies gain a +2 luck {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, while each of your foes takes a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on such {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}.
52626efb-5631-429c-a7d7-e678be1e8830: You call upon the primordial power of ancient microfauna to shrink the {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} of your target. Your target shrinks to microscopic proportions, decreasing in size by two categories. The target gains a +6 size {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} score.
ba6134d8-a72f-4974-9c1c-49222ec43291: You can assume a half-dragon form. You gain plus 2 to all attributes, and {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}strength{/g} by 6. You also increase by 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} category, and you gain golden wings. You also gain a dragon's bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}.
1b374d8c-59cf-4fd1-8a67-4aea49b1babf: You can assume the form of a Gold Dragon. You gain the following abilities: a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, a +8 size bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +8 form natural armor bonus, Blindsense 60 feet. You also gain one bite ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g}), two claws (2d6), two wing {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} (1d8), and one tail slap attack (2d6).
f150acba-5fd8-4602-aff4-df104c41071e: You can cast boneshatter and plague storm spells.
4d896cbc-9094-4340-8e21-829ebfadb14c: You can cast poison breath, creeping doom, and cape of wasps spells.
d4ae75b6-802a-4f9e-bcc1-cbdcd6e88c5a:
You can cast the first {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} after an {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} if that spell is either of a 1st level or is at least two levels lower than the maximum level of spells you can cast.
Sorcerous Reflex does not work with the 0 level spells (cantrips and orisons).
6e75953a-81cb-460a-9c5e-1f30e944a289:
You can create a surge of mythic powers that frees you from all magical restraints.
Benefit: Three times per day you automatically dispel any effects that make you Frightened, Dazed, Sickened, Shaken, Staggered, Nauseated, Stunned, Paralyzed or Confused whenever you become affected by any of those effects.
6b60966f-a26e-463a-bb07-bddddb48af7b: You can drink a potion as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
9afe4a11-b9f4-431e-ab0a-14fb8c69750f: You can easily slip into shadow at any time. You can enter {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}stealth{/g} during combat as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}. This stealth is not broken by a single enemy detecting you — instead it acts similar to the invisibility {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, giving you total {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} against all creatures that did not succeed on a {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception check{/g} against you.
96b755e4-0573-42f6-af19-e3655df9fdf3:
You can fire many times each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} with amazing precision.
Benefit: When using Rapid Shot you ignore the {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}'s –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
1edc58b8-63fe-4303-b777-8dbe84163476: You can grant the benefits of your Sword of Heaven ability to all allies in a 50-foot radius.
54a193ca-60ed-40c4-8e82-ee1da216b524: You can make any creature fight on your side as if it was your ally. It will {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability. However this creature will try to throw off the domination effect, making a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
0a81b6c8-ff9e-4ba9-b3dd-5000a8b552d9:
You can make your patron give you additional powers.
Benefit: This ability lets you select any Witch Hex, and grants you the ability to use the selected Hex. You lose the ability to use the Hex after choosing another Hex with this ability.
0715ed11-5e31-4944-a63b-21f260cea7b5: You can now understand how to use magical items even better. Every item with an enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} that you identify has this enhancement bonus increased by 1.
16d6415a-bc45-4070-a135-7c2e8464add6: You can now use one more minor aspect simultaneously.
db1fbb2d-e684-43a1-a9d3-8a79a5b23761:
You can now use your mythic powers to fuel your metamagic abilities.
Benefit: Select one kind of metamagic. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} level cost for its use decreases by one (to a minimum of 0).
026c4639-c76e-4053-9ae6-2b5545a0dc2d: You can only use this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} while in Demonic Rage. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you grant the effects of Demonic Rage to all allies in a 30-foot range for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
d2471fc0-2a35-4c39-a781-b68fa1730777: You can only use this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} while in Demonic Rage. As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you grant the target effects of Demonic Rage for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
cba144ff-8a01-4783-828b-0cb91c6431b5:
You can quickly deter others with your martial mastery.
Benefit: While wielding the weapon with which you have Weapon Focus, you can use Dazzling Display as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} with a –5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on your {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} to intimidate, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} with a –10 penalty, or as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} with a –20 penalty.
1309f449-fbc8-4cae-abf6-9ae0e2222db1: You can reveal hidden effects that can be used by wearers of magical equipment. Every item you identify gets an additional random minor effect.
08c5494d-9441-45a1-a757-cae129446016: You can reveal item properties that aren't even there and couldn't possibly be there. Every item you identify gets an additional random major effect.
f07f2c0a-2fee-49b3-bdd9-5bf8526f3de5: You can select any {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, ignoring its prerequisites.
62c2c23b-3ffb-462e-be5e-f1cfe456fc9b: You can shoot a ray as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. If it hits, it deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}.
642dc374-14ba-429f-9931-455f48d8c887:
You can strike your foes with incredible force.
Benefit: Whenever you use Vital Strike, Improved Vital Strike, or Greater Vital Strike to multiply the number of dice you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, you also multiply your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}, weapon's enhancement bonus and other bonuses that would normally be multiplied on a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} by the same number.
Extra damage from sources that wouldn't normally be multiplied on a critical hit isn't multiplied by this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
6306d192-999e-4b47-8f2a-80d0c8562dba: You can use command undead at will. All undead under your command within 50 feet of you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} equal to half your mythic rank plus 1.
