34ec1491-fc82-4cb7-abc6-29dca9f356be:
You can use your mythic powers to change your kinetic blasts ever further.
Benefit: You can simultaneously apply two substance infusions to your kinetic blasts.
7d926af3-684b-44ed-a37e-38b86cb55b7d: You clear an ally's mind from corrupting thoughts. You dispel rage, fear, emotion, confusion and morale effects, and give the target immunity to fear and emotion effects for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per mythic rank.
4e45b73c-47bd-4064-ab84-619abbf74ea9: You conjure abyssal energies to empower your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}. The next two attacks, plus one additional attack per 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} above 7 (one at CL 12, two at CL 17) deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per 2 caster levels. Alternatively, you can use one of the charges to make a range {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, dealing the same amount of damage.
314c6654-0d8f-4cea-b970-5776e6ea0bdd: You corrupt an enemy's blood, making it contagious. The target is nauseated for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. Every round it can make a new {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} to remove the nauseated condition. If the saving throw is successful, the target instead becomes sickened. If the target dies while nauseated condition, it deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}6d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to all creatures in a 15-foot radius and applies Corrupted Blood to them.
5ffcc41e-1282-468b-8e98-25d39fe648fa: You create a 20-foot radius area for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. Each round every creature in the area is {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} per two caster levels.
9c281cd1-9a22-40c0-9751-553bc74f670f: You create a 60-foot long line of holy energy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} holy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} to all targets on the line.
1309cfa9-262f-4d8f-b2e0-6c3e7df194b2: You create a devastating storm of abyssal energies, which deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} electricity and 1d6 unholy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} to every creature in a 40-foot radius around you.
7302f8a2-e187-4d22-a91a-c9927dd3c472: You create a pit around Nightshade Nightcrawler. It works as Create Pit {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, but additionally channels negative energy for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and creates a Nightshade Nightcrawler in the middle for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per caster level.
0fab52fd-8204-49ce-9f03-81efe1125cb9: You create a raging supernova for the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your caster level. Each affected target must succeed on a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} or become blinded for {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} rounds. Each round all targets in the area are dealt ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} + Caster level) fire and Divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (Reflex half).
0e85104d-100d-4ecc-b704-6d620356d35e: You create a rain of halberds, making an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g} against every creature in a 10-foot radius. A successful attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing{/g} and piercing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, and can critically strike.
b91cfb19-a50e-4a4e-8134-00a3e1cabf09: You create a shield made of bones around yourself. It gives you +6 shield {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g} for 1 minute per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
89d9c4c9-5434-40b5-8f27-3b46609f0a32: You create a terrible abomination in an area. It {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} everything inside, trying to trip (using caster's level instead of {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}BAB{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spellcasting{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}), dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} plus {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, entangling and dealing 1d4 damage to a random physical ability score. The area lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per caster level.
024a8a45-4d33-45a3-a60e-cbb956ecd4c8: You create a wall of light, which deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of holy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} to any evil creature going through it. It grants any good or neutral creature an ability to deal 2d6 additional {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g} with their next {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. If a good or neutral creature charges through the wall, it instead deals 1d6 holy damage per caster level with their next attack.
a92b7dbe-c93b-4049-983f-656ca4e7ee86: You create a zone where every creature {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} 11 on every d20 roll they make. The zone lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}.
eb5a6960-ebd0-434d-80b4-47e288ecf513: You create an area of starlight around yourself. All invisibility effects on enemies in the area are suppressed, and {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} against your allies in the area suffer from a 20% miss chance.
62a25d8f-5ce1-4ca2-8b80-ddd355c5ddb7:
You create an extradimensional black hole for the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your mythic rank.
Any Huge or smaller creature standing in a 20-foot range of the place where you have conjured the black hole can make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} to safely jump to the nearest vacant space. Each affected creature must succeed on a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} or become entirely disintegrated, leaving behind only a trace of fine dust. A disintegrated creature's equipment is unaffected. On a successful Fortitude save the affected creature is dealt 80 divine damage.
Any creature that avoids disintegration, but stays in the black hole, is dealt 10 divine damage per round.
All creatures within a 20-foot range around the black hole are dealt 1d10 divine damage per round and are slowed, as per slow spell.
8b585347-7b32-4251-8ec9-ef9f19e5e818:
You create an extradimensional comfy hole with a depth of 10 feet per two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum 30 feet) and a trampoline at the bottom. Since the pit extends into another dimension, the pit has no weight and does not otherwise displace the original underlying material. You can create the pit in the deck of a ship as easily as in a dungeon floor or the ground of a forest.
Any large or smaller creature standing in the area where you first conjured the pit must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} to not jump to safety in the pit. In addition, the edges of the pit are sloped, and any creature ending its turn on a square adjacent to the pit must make a Reflex saving throw with a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to avoid falling into it. Creatures subjected to an effect intended to push them into the pit (such as bull rush) do not get a saving throw to avoid falling in if they are affected by the pushing effect.
Creatures who fall into the pit take no falling {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (the trampoline is really handy).
Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} any creature in the pit is {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} as extradimensional entities heal their wounds and make massage.
To climb the pit's soft and cozy walls, a creature needs a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of 25. When the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} ends, creatures within the hole rise up with the bottom of the pit until they are standing on the surface over the course of a single round.
b683d9a7-f442-45e3-b4f6-e101500c725c: You create an invisible force, which {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damages{/g} the enemy for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} damage per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. The target then makes a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g}. If it is failed, the target becomes prone and you either push or pull it with a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}Combat Maneuver{/g}, using your caster level in place of {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}BAB{/g} and casting stat in place of {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}.
0bd6119f-2ce9-4a0f-8059-4cb17806b5d8: You dispel petrification and enemy's transmutation {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and effects from the target.
04461f79-f5a9-4e39-8615-c4ebf482dfbd: You exceed at {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}stealth{/g} so much that you can avoid {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Target}spells targeting{/g} you. You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to your Stealth {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} – 10.
afc96804-9361-46c9-b2ab-32cf795d8b95: You exceed at {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}stealth{/g}, fading from sight with your every move. Your stealth in combat now works more akin to greater invisibility {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} effect.
dabf0a94-fcf9-4315-8229-7f72626e4d07: You fall into a coma and start receiving {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} drain every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. You can attempt new {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} every round, and a successful save leaves you staggered for 1 more round and makes you suffer 1d6 Constitution drain.
7ac516df-be1b-4a82-884e-7b291a4ac5f9:
You feel a closer connection to your deity you serve.
Benefit: You gain one more domain, ignoring all domain prerequisites. This ability can only be taken by a cleric, inquisitor, or a hunter with the divine hunter archetype.
d47bac5e-c52f-4ec9-b7cd-255b78f46e47: You force the target's blood to overflow in its body. The target receives {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, and makes a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}. If it fails, the target receives 1d6 {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} damage and 2d6 bleed damage.
2d47124a-15f2-444e-9ca5-83eb0ccd78e3: You gain +6 shield {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g}.
926f5dae-61cb-44bc-9c6a-27f79f968e99: You gain -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} for every effect dispelled with Corrupt Magic.
b5e5d955-e268-4020-89f7-4b0e72591b22: You gain a +1 Mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to the selected stat.
581396aa-63f4-4942-8ed1-1db605bac63c: You gain a +2 luck {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
7b209cfe-fc49-4495-90fe-2b7733d7e0cc:
You gain a +3 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to Persuasion {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} made to intimidate, all demons summoned by Demonic Regent receive an immunity to fire and are under Shield of Dawn effect. Demonic Regent also gains the following ability:
Profane Benediction (Su): Demonic Regent can grant himself a +2 profane bonus to an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}. Simultaneously only one such effect can be in place.
c4b5c087-1143-4544-bef7-4e90be1a42ca: You gain a +3 luck bonus to AC.
fc06c995-c6f6-4e6e-aa76-b09c399bf7f7: You gain a +3 luck bonus to attack.
874122e6-020d-4ff6-a3ae-5988faf9476c: You gain a +3 luck bonus to damage.
86eaa609-d1d8-4ddc-a77f-47a756727f28:
You gain a +5 inherent {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} made to intimidate. All demons summoned by Demonic Overlord receive an immunity to fire, are under Shield of Dawn effect and immune to charm and compulsion effects. Demonic Overlord also gains the following ability:
Profane Invocation: Demonic Overlord can grant himself a +2 profane bonus to two {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}. Simultaneously only one such effect can be in place.
73e55c83-dc07-437c-8c80-02547c065ab1: You gain a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
bf8b254b-f1e7-4d3b-85e1-262cb782f3b8: You gain a bonus feat. You can take this mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} any number of times.
d4b517a5-2fd5-4ba9-9eda-c4faf694789b: You gain a natural armor bonus equal to 1 + 1 per 3 caster levels. You also gain resistance to blows, cuts, stabs, and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashes{/g}. The caster gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/cold iron and good. It ignores the first 10 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} each time it takes damage from a weapon. Once the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} has prevented a total of 10 points of damage per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, it is discharged.
535251a7-722e-41e2-b3f9-7f0d7eb3efe0: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} mythic ability. You can take this mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} multiple times.
c3f4d4e2-d7a7-4288-980d-6bcbf3d799e3:
You gain the ability to breath holy energy, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacking{/g} all enemies in a 50-foot cone, dealing ({g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} plus half mythic rank){g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier) halves the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
Any enemy hit by the breath attack also gains a -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on all d20 rolls, while all enemies who failed the Reflex saving throw gain -2 penalty.
You can use your breath attack once every 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
43444ef3-7705-47aa-afb7-2b4fdac366fa:
You gain the ability to control magic around you in three ways:
Enforcing Gaze — Primordial Magic Damage. All the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} your allies cast deal bonus {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to your mythic rank to all targets. All the spells cast by enemies who failed their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} suffer the same {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
Enforcing Gaze — Primordial Magic Support. You grant your allies the ability to cast a second spell per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} as long as both spells only affect you or your allies. Any time an enemy casts a spell that affects another enemy its {g|Encyclopedia:Casting_Time}casting time{/g} increases to a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}.
Enforcing Gaze — Primordial Magic {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Heal{/g}. All the healing spells your allies cast restore 2 more points of damage per your mythic rank to all its targets. All spells cast by enemies who failed their saving throw suffer the same penalty.
Only one Primordial Magic gaze can be active at a time.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 penalty on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used (1 + your mythic rank) times per day.
0d77f384-eabd-41de-8537-05e8cd4a2970: You gain the ability to make your own clones using the swarm. They have all your abilities, but separate inventory. You can simultaneously have one clone per three points of your swarm size, but no more than one clone at 8 mythic rank, two clones at 9 mythic rank and five clones at 10 mythic rank.
8a383650-ff54-4348-8849-4982345d86bd: You gain the ability to use dominate monster as a {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like ability{/g} at will. Additionally, you gain fire resistance 20 and a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against poison.
59508b7d-8a4b-4567-ba6e-01f07487ec18: You gain the ability to use hellfire ray and power word stun as {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g} at will. Additionally, you gain immunity to fire, cold and acid resistance 10, and all your weapons count as being Lawful and Evil.
e130ec21-48a1-4c6a-b4b6-c5d981ea942a: You gain the ability to use overwhelming presence and power word kill as {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g} at will.
3a69d6f2-f196-42ab-a3f6-d6e7abeefbea: You gain the ability to use the authority of Hell to shape mythic powers into other forms. Three times per day, you can gain the ability to use Sword of Heaven ability with one improvement or Demonic rage with one aspect for the next ten minutes.
68e8ba53-137f-4f32-befe-eee187c9baab: You gain undead immunities, negative energy affinity and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/{g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning{/g}.
449563ff-ef7b-48c0-8217-b9effc08147c: You get a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. You also get additional {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, their number equal to your mythic rank.
afe51d5f-e74c-45fc-a3e3-78fd329fa8dc:
You grant one ally the ability to mark an enemy as the target for the hunt. You lose control of this ally immediately, and they try to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} the prey, gaining a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to attack and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} equal to your mythic rank.
This effect lasts until the end of combat, or until the target is dead.
323e47e2-5ce3-4716-a78c-2582a46c1985: You grant the target the effect of the Shield of Law {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, as well as resistance to fire, electricity, cold and acid for 10 minutes per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. Additionally, when the spell is cast you also cast Dictum on the same target.
b23a4fe0-ee5b-4004-8bd4-b226e851b77f:
You grant your allied summoned unit {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} equal to half your mythic rank. Enemy summoned units who fail their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} are instantly banished.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the bonuses immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used 1 plus mythic rank times per day.
8d9d1b44-1c4d-4b32-8175-87f81f276b2b:
You grant your allies a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g} equal to your mythic rank. Your enemies who failed their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} have to make a concentration {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} every time they cast a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} to successfully cast it.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the bonuses immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used 1 plus mythic rank times per day.
9e58f2ff-a050-4a1c-9c94-51fdc986569b:
You grant your allies a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} equal to (1 + half your mythic rank). Your enemies who failed their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their combat maneuver checks equal to the same number.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the bonuses immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 penalty on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used (1 + your mythic rank) times per day.
35af4d0b-83c8-486b-b451-6d0060696d8e:
You grant your allies immunity to non-instant area effects from your and your allies' {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and abilities. Your allies who enter a non-instant area effect from an enemy spell or ability automatically try to dispel it by making a dispel {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} equal to ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d20{/g} + half your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} + your mythic rank).
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear.
This ability can be used (1 + your mythic rank) times per day.
bafd1b0f-92fc-4a4c-9b7d-6faf4a09015d:
You grant your allies temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to twice your mythic rank. Your enemies who failed their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per 3 mythic ranks each time they hit any target with one of their {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used 1 plus mythic rank times per day.
80cf2ddc-0d37-4bd4-a7c6-c1dfbead2084:
You grant your allies the ability to cast a second {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} as long as both spells only affect you or your allies. Any time an enemy casts a spell that affects another enemy its {g|Encyclopedia:Casting_Time}casting time{/g} increases to a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}.
Only one Primordial Magic gaze can be active at a time.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used (1 + your mythic rank) times per day.
695335a8-25f3-4148-9f0a-2196e9ae9d50:
You grant your allies who can make more than one {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} one additional {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} of opportunity per round. All attacks of opportunity your allies make gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to attack and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} equal to +1 per mythic rank. Your enemies who can make more than one attack of opportunity per turn and fail their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} lose all their additional attacks of opportunity until the end of combat. All attacks of opportunity your enemies make suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to attack and damage rolls equal to -1 per mythic rank.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the bonuses immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 penalty on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used (1 + your mythic rank) times per day.
a25404c7-82e9-4f2d-aabc-f3fab2feb381:
You grant your allies {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/Chaotic where N is equal to double your mythic rank. Your enemies who failed their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} have their DR reduced by an amount equal to your mythic rank.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used 1 plus mythic rank times per day.
0b5c1348-50b0-4597-b5e2-8d064e81d8c4:
You grant your allies {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}energy resistance{/g} to the most common types of energy (acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic) equal to 5 per your mythic rank. Your enemies who failed their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} have their energy resistance reduced by an amount equal to your mythic rank.
Once activated, this ability lasts until the combat ends, at which point all of the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} immediately disappear. Enemies can try to make a Will saving throw to resist this effect, receiving a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on the throw if they have the Chaotic {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}alignment{/g}.
This ability can be used (1 + your mythic rank) times per day.
f1eedc3a-d618-4e3b-a046-eef7b8f5f764: You have a divine connection with death, thus you can grant your undead followers divine power by making them worship you.
30852793-6a3f-41d9-a03f-0c9e4ee11375: You have consumed the powers of a siabrae. You can now cast the stoneskin {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. While under this spell's effect, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 15/Adamantine (instead of the normal DR 10/adamantine).
3090ab92-856f-4caa-88ac-ba859d8a25d8:
You have found out that curses can be a blessing, and now you know how to use them.
Benefit: You gain an additional Oracle Curse, but it gives you no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}.
5d5c5f03-39b1-4f2c-a636-9d4766aeacba: You have learned of a way to improve the efficiency of used magical items. {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}Caster level{/g} of all abilities from magical items you use is increased by your mythic rank.
ffa1dae5-1e77-4ef6-88a8-23025f7e165a: You have learned of a way to use items so delicately that the use is completely unnoticed. Wands you use no longer lose charges for use and you can equip any magical items possible, regardless of requirements.
a47e8acc-0c36-4b0a-9ff4-cc830338ae44: You have learned that there is a very unconventional and effective way to use scrolls. Apparently, there are those guys called "Wizards" and they use scrolls in a very original way — instead of using magic from scroll outright they copy it into this thing they call "{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spellbook{/g}", and then use the spell every day. You now have one of those spellbooks, and can copy spells into it from scrolls as if you were a wizard of your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g}.
f4aa86d7-eca9-4488-ae5a-3e9670782ffd:
You have mastered the art of applying elixirs at a distance.
Benefit: You can now apply your elixirs from a distance of 30 feet.
52f6025e-54cb-4293-b1fe-64a22c87cb11:
You have mythical resilience and durability.
Benefit: Toughness provides you twice as many {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}. In addition, when you're below 0 hit points, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/epic.
7fd40f28-5828-447a-9a73-b0ef88c2490a:
You have studied a way to increase the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you can cast per day.
Benefit: You can cast four more spells per day of 4th, 5th, and 6th levels each. This ability does not affect mythic spellbooks.
a8ab65a1-c003-4ae1-83d7-e5fae9f98a5c: You know how to deal with both mortal and immortal flesh. When used against an enemy, this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d8{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to living targets and (2d8 + caster level) to undead targets. When used on an ally, it instead {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} undead targets for (4d8 + caster level) and living targets for (2d8 + caster level) damage.
5e42185b-0c2a-481e-b747-caaf57c97d0a: You know how to gain {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}strength{/g} from fallen allies and enemies alike. You gain +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} for every dead creature in a 30-foot radius up to maximum of 3 + 1 per five {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is +3 or higher you additionally gain effects of the haste {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
fbdfc719-b5f7-48c8-9244-0e429c61702e: You know nature so well that you know that it is natural to find gold and valuables in the wild. Every time you hunt you get some gold, potions, scrolls and other valuables.
7d00fd37-b4b9-4937-8064-3c7b0ef46792: You know nature so well that you know that it is perfectly natural to find powerful magical items in the wild. Maybe they do grow on trees after all? You return from your hunts with random magical items.
0594e28a-caa4-4440-9cb4-62676a34fa7a: You know so much trivia that you know how to do almost anything better, and can give helpful advice to others. Whenever you, or anyone within 50 feet from you, make a {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} other than {g|Encyclopedia:Knowledge_World}Knowledge (world){/g}, you add half your mythic rank to the roll.
2e1d318c-1af8-40e9-9c7b-39a79982021b: You launch a smelly, slimy, putrid fish at your enemy as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. The fish deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g}, plus an additional 1d6 per two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} you have above the first. On a successful hit, the target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} or be sickened for 1d4+1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
2b9b7f6e-536b-450f-9c06-585e9f23a7ef:
You leap into the fray with speed and confidence.
Benefit: The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} granted by Improved Initiative increases by an amount equal to your mythic rank.
d5425b9c-bc2d-4c1c-b48d-fd690fae9c93: You learned how to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} not only the body, but the soul as well. Your Treat Affliction removes not only poisons and diseases, but any negative conditions affecting the target.
e5e38c9a-8f40-46b0-bcf7-740449adf166:
You learned to use any shapes to the utmost.
Benefit: Whenever you become the target of a polymorph effect, all the physical {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} adjustments are modified by +4. Additionally, if you have the Wild Shape ability, you can use it any number of times per day.
5cd751e9-39ac-46fe-a0f7-7a3be9249b6e:
You learned to utilize the real power of the Shadows.
Benefit: Your Shadow {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} are 20% more real.
46f763cc-be68-4f03-baa6-a07dfc8caf9f:
You leave a mystical link with enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spellcasters{/g} that lets you instantly move to them.
Benefit: Every time you are targeted by an enemy spell, you gain the ability to teleport to the spellcaster as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} for the next two {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
dfe4738b-9048-4c25-be68-d25db3f3e25f: You make a {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} against any undead creature. If it fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}, it is immediately destroyed. If the target succeeds, it is dealt {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} plus 1 damage per 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}.
173786c2-d09f-4828-be1c-82e2052ffe8a: You make the flow of time favor allies and disrupt opponent's {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g}. Your allies gain the benefits of the Haste {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} effect, while enemies are affected by Slow spell effect.
7bed2635-54b2-4b51-82a6-b42914408ea9:
You make the target appear more intimidating, while making it possible to feed on fear. The target gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion checks{/g} made to intimidate equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. Every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} the target is {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} for 1 hp for every shaken or frightened enemy in a 30-foot radius. This effect works for a number of rounds equal to your caster level.
When the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} is cast, every enemy in 10 feet around the target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} or be frightened for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} rounds.
daf55b6f-123f-4fcc-b8b8-db271c9d6887: You make your ally perfect in mental and physical aspects. If any of their ability score before modifiers is less than their highest ability score, they gain a bonus up to that number for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
f3e68f1e-ef15-4bbf-8d90-ea2b3d211c79: You make your ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} more uniform. Full {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}BAB{/g} attacks made by the target get a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, but all attacks with BAB-10 or worse get a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on attack {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}. The effect lasts for 10 minutes per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
afc116e6-bf7e-4688-9e97-37e77b637c1d: You make your blood boil, making you faster and more ferocious. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per two caster levels, you gain the effects of the Haste {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. Additionally, every time you reduce a creature below zero {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g}, you prolong the effect. If the killed creature had more HD than your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, the duration is increased by 3 rounds. Otherwise, it is increased by 1 round.
bdec8cc0-28f5-4257-86ce-366963731f0f: You mark a target with a curse of servitude. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}, the target is dealt {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per round. If the target dies during the effect, it is revived after {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g} as an undead creature under your command.
00551701-3a8c-4779-87f1-d87c3ba94748:
You mastered a certain element to a spectacular level.
Benefit: Choose one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, sonic, or negative). The {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of that energy type you deal can no longer be prevented or reduced by energy resistances or energy immunities. This bonus works on any damage you deal with the chosen energy type.
8c70ca32-0c34-4207-a711-fe9ca475d17a:
You mastery with this {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} is unmatched, even in difficult situations.
Benefit: You can always take 10 on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} with your choice of skill for Skill Focus if 10 on a {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} is enough for a successful skill check.
c54c74a7-0456-409c-ada6-ebe2a43b0c0a: You may call down a rainbow star that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} points of acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, depending on the greatest potential damage (taking into consideration the target's immunities and {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}energy resistances{/g}). The star falls down in a vertical stroke at whatever target point you choose within long range.
b7f23739-85ef-4c78-9f27-a088b4faed8e:
You moved closer to your deity and to the power it has over its divine domains.
Benefit: You can use the abilities of your domains as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
98fe84c1-63a8-4433-8615-102648bb8723: You no longer suffer your racial {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}. Only races with a penalty to an ability score can take this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
9ae4f4de-f9f1-4567-acfc-668e8f53bf15: You now know enough about religion to start your own. You can select two additional domains.
51fd0c25-0f91-4c2c-b45e-8448f60bde8e: You now know religion so well that you can use abilities usually reserved for clerics. You can select two domains. You gain abilities of those domains and can use {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} from those domains once per day as long as the level of those spells is lower than your mythic rank.
7f274216-c7a1-43f6-aa99-ff0068120b61: You now know so much about the world that you understand that everything in this world is decided by dice. And you are good at dice. You have some very special dice that you will use from now on. Every time a member of your party would {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} a 1 on a d20 roll the result of the roll instead becomes 20.
5e563f5f-2880-463e-9645-7d94e5b5ef68: You now know that whole world is just a game. But that is ultimately in your favor, because you are good at games, and at changing rules in your favor. You and members of your party can now ignore requirements of {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} when leveling up.
41291f8f-d882-4ecb-80c5-9c9fed4d71fb: You only suffer a -4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on your iterative {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, instead of -5 penalty.
5c1df85b-0d09-427c-abba-156525ae7b74:
You opened your mind and soul to learn the secrets of a second mystery.
Benefit: You gain a second Oracle Mystery.
6d49ec9b-186c-4077-a925-cea40650315e: You place a ward, guarding the target from {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}. For the next 10 minutes per level if the target dies, it is instead saved, but paralyzed until the end of battle.
557d84bd-58a2-406e-8ff2-426553ff1385:
You push foes around with amazing ease.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to bull rush, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent bull rushes you. These bonuses stack with those granted by non-mythic Greater Bull Rush.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts to bull rush you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
8ee20403-2d44-4aeb-ae48-dadd53ef6774:
You release a powerful stroke of energy that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of holy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. The target needs to make a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g}, or become prone.
If the target is evil, the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} instead deals 1d8 points of holy {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}damage{/g} per caster level. The target needs to make a successful Reflex saving throw, or become prone and suffer a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and saving throws.
If the target is an evil outsider or an undead creature, the spell instead deals 1d10 points of holy damage per caster level. The target needs to make a successful Reflex saving throw, or become prone and suffer a -4 penalty to AC, attack rolls and saving throws.
If the target is a demon lord, an evil dragon or a lord of undead (a powerful undead creature like liches, undead dragons, nightshades and similar), the spell instead deals 1d12 points of holy damage per caster level. The target suffers a -4 penalty to AC, attack rolls and saving throws. It also needs to make a successful Reflex saving throw, or become prone.
39772499-b1dc-41b3-b68a-dd9f9d5ced45:
You return all of the swarm into your body. You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/- plus your swarm {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} and a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to natural armor equal to (4 plus your swarm size).
Using this ability cancels Swarm Infest and Swarm Feast.
6a83c1f1-a584-43cf-81d1-41aec2fdecb9: You see more than other people. You are constantly affected by the equivalent of the see invisibility spell.
e81841c6-7313-457d-ad30-23de03c10096:
You send a part of your swarm to devour a corpse to increase the {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} of your swarm.
The increase depends on the CR of the devoured corpse. When the amount of eaten enemies hits a threshold, you gain permanently increased {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from other Swarm That Walks abilities.
4a547fdf-00d5-495f-9c47-8a3ed7acd53f:
You send a part of your swarm to infest an enemy. It makes the target blind and deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}8d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Physical_Damage}physical damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases by 2d8 for each point of your swarm size. If the target dies while under this effect, it's automatically devoured.
When the ability ends (by activating Swarm Form ability), you are {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} for the amount of damage you've dealt to the enemy with Swarm Infest.
Additionally, the target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 15 + double your mythic rank) or become panicked.
Using this ability cancels Swarm Form and Swarm Feast.
9d2a7a29-911e-4bdd-80ba-ddf4f7682f57: You shoot a ray of holy fire as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, half of which is fire and half is holy.
b9afca8c-1d76-41e7-be65-9863d1a898c1: You siphon the power of unlife from the target undead creature. If it's an enemy, it is dealt {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, and you are {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} for the same amount. If it's an ally, the damage is maximized to 8 damage per caster level.
1ae1af07-80c2-4fc0-aadf-ad34511c2829: You steal enemies {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} and vitality. Enemies in a 30-foot radius are affected by the effect of the slow {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, and allies are affected by Haste.
ec3bdfb8-5330-44b0-9a53-63112ac54bb2: You suffer a -2 penalty to your Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution ability scores. Your movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is reduced by 10 feet. Your attacks have a 20% miss chance.
784c553c-9c16-41da-b09a-3e103dde1c02: You summon a Phantasmal {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Healer{/g}, who stays in place for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, equal one per every four {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}. Each round it heals every living creature in a 30-foot radius for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per four caster levels. The creatures make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} to halve the amount.
0deb16e6-f101-4944-8b2c-e01e6934b1ba: You summon a soothing light, warming the hearts of your allies and obscuring the vision of your enemies. Every ally in 20ft radius gets 1 temporary hit point for 1 hour, and the enemies become dazzled for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
f757caab-9b91-4894-8e76-419deef4ebd4: You surround the target with necromantic energies, embracing it with the power of unlife. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}, it falls into a coma and starts receiving {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} drain every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. It can attempt new saving throws every round. On a successful save it is staggered for 1 more round and suffers 1d6 Constitution drain.
46d8a75c-d0ee-42c7-ad4d-d7198d7db8e4: You take control of the target's bones, forcefully tearing them away from the body and forming them into a deadly projectile. This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} instantly delivers 10 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} unless the target succeeds on a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}. Should the target die from this damage, a Bone Spear forms in from its bones. You can launch this bone spear at any moment within the next five {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} damage per caster level to each creature within a 60-foot line.
cb325c02-ce0a-4633-a703-4e2af1f20692: You take the form of a babau, getting its protective slime ability.
f085a453-d098-446f-af78-5c788624286f: You take the form of a balor, getting its vorpal strike ability.
d03b177a-c54b-4496-983f-c0c54e4a0630: You take the form of a brimorak, getting its fire breath and flaming weapon abilities.
5a557e9d-5d8a-40bc-893a-7daa272361f0: You take the form of a derakni, getting its poison and drone abilities.
67824daf-6799-4d0b-898a-0a5a8e8e1dac: You take the form of a gallu, getting its rain of blood ability.
696616bd-707b-4103-a24b-52abc376ea0c: You take the form of a glabrezu, getting its rend ability.
71f9f73f-6251-4417-aeb8-8c00f779eb5c: You take the form of a kalavakus, getting its powerful charge and horns abilities.
d255eae7-8353-4847-b071-c1584f077026: You take the form of a marilith, getting its crushing tail ability.
974de1a7-20f3-49c2-b909-358b9a82625d: You take the form of a nabasu, getting its {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}-stealing gaze ability, which they can use for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
7e4a1e3e-6bcd-4b7f-8a71-6ea22696c692: You take the form of a nalfeshnee, getting its incredible {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}strength{/g}.
61ab9654-4dd2-42f2-8b0b-e8a4e4bd2e11: You take the form of a schir, getting its powerful charge ability.
13f4ba80-e0fb-4fe1-bd93-64752be60b3d: You take the form of a vavakia, getting its breath weapon ability.
6df738f4-2ceb-4c32-a3e5-fdfbd3eb04f0: You take the form of a vrock, getting its Mirror Image ability.
cb64a5cf-0f4f-4963-8d7e-9ad229fe9bc6: You trap the target in solid ice. If the creature fails its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g}, it is paralyzed, if the target makes its save, it gains the entangled condition and cannot cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}. Whether or not the target saves, it takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} and 2d6 divine each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} it is paralyzed or entangled in the ice. A creature can break the ice with a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} each round after receiving the effect ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 15 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}).
15e5d808-5a26-47a3-a891-a61abc07172d: You try to dispel every effect from every creature in 30ft radius, gaining +10 in the {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to dispel.
2414ed79-7e83-4207-a3f0-d1ce55243755:
You use your mythic powers to fuel kineticist abilities.
Benefit: Gather power ability now reduces the burn cost of the kineticist blasts by one additional burn point.
d37efdce-9e60-4bb2-964f-491808d5aa7e:
You use your mythic powers to power your judgments.
Benefit: You can now use judgments any number of times per day.
11b4ee7d-ad55-4665-9c6a-e6b62fa070c2: You {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} yourself for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and automatically dispel any negative effects on yourself.
6df46593-39e5-488e-8b02-d3d15181d9c3:
You're a master of down-and-dirty fighting.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to attempt a dirty trick, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent attempts to perform a dirty trick on you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Greater Dirty Trick.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts a dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}maneuver{/g} against you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
38232375-7fc6-40d6-b354-0e0bb7472de3:
You're a master of using your shield for protection.
Benefit: Add your shield {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and your shield's enhancement bonus to your {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
b5bc6a9f-1c14-48c4-a221-0157939b7960:
You're a mythical master of one type of weapon.
Benefit: Double the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} on your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} from Weapon Focus and Greater Weapon Focus.
acb43d0b-fd92-4a76-9a88-1937b4cdf997:
You're an expert with weapons that rely on your agility.
Benefit: When using Weapon Finesse, you may also use your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier instead of your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier on your {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}.
2645e152-48eb-4e86-9f1d-a66eb61ab2cc:
You're expert at knocking your enemies' weapons away.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to disarm, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent tries to disarm you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Greater Disarm.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts to disarm you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
1bc61e1a-71e9-4991-ba7c-826525f877b6:
You're expert at knocking your foes down.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to trip, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent tries to trip you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Improved Trip.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts to trip you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
49f4ac41-2b13-4557-8382-b0497e83954d:
You've found a way to infuse your blood with even more power.
Benefit: You select a second bloodline, getting all its benefits.
aa8ef06f-9d1b-4cc3-aa39-658d974dc78f:
You've found a way to use your {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}perception{/g} and knowledge to better defend yourself.
Benefit: Your Studied Target ability gives you a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against the target of your Studied Target ability equal to the bonus this ability gives you to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
40f24b83-77b2-45f3-a647-21723bb21bcb:
You've learned a way to fill your arcane reservoir to the maximum.
Benefit: You no longer gain only 3 + 1/2 arcanist level arcane points in the arcane reservoir after a {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g}. Instead, you gain 3 + arcanist level points.
0af91986-2670-4af3-9019-914ac343a3ed:
You've learned a way to increase the number of uses of your Smite Chaos ability.
Benefit: You can use Smite Chaos a number of additional times per day equal to half your mythic rank.
2418fe51-209f-4511-8731-fc2fb22364d9:
You've learned a way to increase the number of uses of your Smite Evil ability.
Benefit: You can use Smite Evil a number of additional times per day equal to half your mythic rank.
7b1356c9-1380-4c28-b799-3fdab0bb608d:
You've learned a way to increase the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day you can use your Bane ability.
Benefit: The number of rounds per day you can use your Bane ability increases by a number of rounds equal to your mythic rank.
eacc8ae0-20f5-46d8-a0b7-3167cfcac3df:
You've learned a way to increase the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you can cast per day.
Benefit: You can cast four more spells per day of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd ranks each. This ability does not affect mythic spellbooks.
ed9c0a5a-e045-4b39-b294-d6b8b684a5aa:
You've learned a way to increase your Arcane Pool.
Benefit: Your Arcane Pool increases by a number of points equal to your mythic rank.
12773003-f4bc-49b3-9606-6461accc2f4e:
You've learned a way to increase your ki pool.
Benefit: Your ki pool increases by a number of points equal to your mythic rank.
40a86c19-4459-437c-891f-cd638468fa86:
You've learned a way to prolong the effects of your beneficial {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
Benefit: Effects of your spells on your allies that should last longer than an hour but shorter than 24 hours now last 24 hours.
36fea083-0c35-4f4f-8aac-c10fe93c2a95:
You've mastered a way to increase the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you can cast per day.
Benefit: You can cast four more spells per day of 7th, 8th, and 9th ranks each. This ability does not affect mythic spellbooks.
25344a83-4809-4706-b649-5c3e9f023bac:
You've mastered a way to prolong your beneficial {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
Benefit: Effects of your spells on your allies that should last longer than 5 minutes but shorter than 24 hours now last 24 hours.
33037ebf-55ec-4a31-adb6-2b88b86eeb83:
You've mastered the art of raining elemental {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} on your foes, and found a way to empower them by combining different elements.
Benefit: Every time a spell you cast deals {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}energy damage{/g} to a creature, you apply an elemental mark to it. If during the next three {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} you deal energy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to a marked target with a different type of energy, the target is dealt additional Divine damage. The damage is {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per mythic rank of your character.
c7f84344-a4d8-4327-9388-c3b31e21c28c:
Your accuracy with {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} is unmatched at point-blank range.
Benefit: The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} granted by Point-Blank Shot increases to +2.
434e2bde-229e-411b-b49a-0ad843019480:
Your animal companion is just as mythic as you.
Benefit: Your animal companion gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} equal to half your mythic rank plus 1. Its {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} now ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} except N/- and count as ghost touch weapons.
60c08be0-b678-452d-8f5e-fe3580e28b09:
Your charge carries the weight of your mythic powers.
Benefit: Your charge {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} deal additional Divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per mythic rank.
aa17a300-061b-4989-a893-db81c0023483:
Your defensive capabilities in combat are unmatched.
Benefit: Add half your mythic rank to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}.
ec9813f3-2dc8-4c24-b46a-c86b7316d778: Your eyes become filled with unthinkable horrors. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}, you gain a gaze, giving your enemies in 30 feet a negative level each round.
c112e32d-c820-4fea-b592-ec15ef2eec85:
Your fortitude is unmatched.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}, roll twice and take the higher result.
9b0eb562-e7a6-42e2-ae57-546743634da2:
Your growing powers let you speak to one more spirit.
Benefit: You gain one more Shaman Spirit.
751aeb59-3d66-4844-9969-ad36d4a7c869:
Your inner fortitude is so strong that it lets you overcome most debilitating conditions.
Benefit: At any time you would become paralyzed, you become staggered instead. If you would become nauseated, you become sickened, and you become shaken instead of frightened.
0e69ac55-a195-488c-ba0a-7b1491aecb09:
Your magical specialties are particularly effective.
Benefit: Choose a {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}school of magic{/g} you already have Spell Focus in. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} DCs provided by Spell Focus and Greater Spell Focus for that school increases by 1.
3b06c8cf-87a4-476e-9b2f-d47c2e55075d: Your main weapon becomes a Living Bane weapon.
a95b74dc-8e04-48ce-9dfe-d8ea89512ebe:
Your mighty smashing blows demolish armor.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to sunder, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent tries to sunder an object used by you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Greater Sunder Armor.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts to sunder an armor used by you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
d80716a5-441f-45bd-b327-a8b81e84afd1:
Your mission is too important to fall in battle and your mythic powers let you endure unbelievable things.
Benefit: Once per day, when your {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} drops low, you become unkillable. For two {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, you become immune to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} that would make you {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g}.
3d25a712-d66e-4f45-a7ad-102827175a9d:
Your mythic magical power breaches your enemies' defenses.
Benefit: Add half your mythic rank to {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}. If you have Greater {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spell{/g} Penetration, add your full mythic rank instead.
0b99dd3c-b478-4db7-a99b-a64f2dadac83:
Your mythic powers can negate any magic around you.
Benefit: Activating this ability grants you magic immunity and dispels any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} effects on you.
a59e0ffb-3d4a-4468-a327-5e7c2e6c14f2:
Your performances are unforgettable.
Benefit: Your bardic performance ability now works as if you were a bard of 6 levels higher.
3d33f212-3129-4fad-803c-1977d969ad31: Your power of unlife lets you temporarily make your own allies similar to undead. For 10 minutes per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} a chosen ally gains undead immunities, negative energy affinity and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/{g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning{/g}.
a2baae63-59bd-4ffa-b7eb-7c659ad29860:
Your rage knows neither limits nor bounds.
Benefit: You no longer have a limited amount of Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day.
a8fb3700-b497-48b8-bc16-424fb1f7cf86:
Your ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are dangerous enough for the enemy to forget about melee threats.
Benefit: If you hit an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged weapon attack{/g}, they receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} equal to half your mythic rank for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
5f1b8357-9452-46de-aa1d-d16617114af3:
Your ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} expose the enemy's vulnerable points.
Benefit: Every third hit with a ranged weapon against the same enemy deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per two mythic ranks divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
9ef18aaf-419d-47f2-8bf1-969a12db1d52:
Your reflexes are superhuman.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g}, roll twice and take the higher result.
5be5e6af-211d-46c9-a340-e50b38015dc7: Your sneak attack deals +2d6 extra damage.
ae67277c-0b51-4817-b30f-558edec2723c:
Your strikes make cracks in the enemy existence, leaving weak points for your allies to strike.
Benefit: Every time you hit a target in melee combat, you leave a mark on it. Any ally {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacking{/g} the marked target deals additional Divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per your mythic rank to the target, consuming the mark.
Note: Only one ally can leave a mark on a target at a time. Others allies with Leading Strike ability do not deal additional damage to a marked target.
c3da0e20-059c-476c-8384-720d8692b3d7:
Your swarm flies out of your body and starts {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacking{/g} all enemies in a 50-foot radius. Every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} all enemies in the area are dealt (4 plus your swarm {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Physical_Damage}physical damage{/g}. If they die while in the area, they are automatically devoured.
Any ranged or ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attacks{/g} against you have a 50% chance to miss.
Using this ability cancels Swarm Form and Swarm Infest.
80c07024-48ee-4e80-9cd7-96a3645a6c45: Your weapon becomes bloodthirsty. It deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) additional {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} the wielder for the same amount.
f227d789-f3a6-44a5-a6a8-5f044a13b927:
Your will is incorruptible.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}, roll twice and take the higher result.
a3433569-d4d7-484b-9b9d-3681c16a1495:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are now less affected by luck.
Benefit: You don't automatically miss when you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} a 1 on an attack roll.
1c4bd4a6-e87a-4528-8fa0-e0eb0a3dd0ca:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are truly devastating.
Benefit: When you use Power Attack, you gain a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} instead of +2. When your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} reaches +4 and every 4 points thereafter, the amount of bonus damage increases by +3 instead of +2.
This bonus to damage is increased to +5 if you are making an attack with a {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}two-handed{/g} weapon, a one-handed weapon using two hands, or a primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapon{/g} that adds 1.5 times your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier on damage {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}.
c2ead968-9515-4a6c-8c53-3199d9087909:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are truly vicious.
Benefit: When you use Piranha Strike, you gain a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} instead of +2. When your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} reaches +4, and every +4 thereafter, the bonus on damage {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} increases by +3 rather than +2.
0d428b26-5986-4ce0-bf38-b67a6a3d81b6:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} strikes with your chosen weapon are deadlier than most.
Benefit: Your critical multiplier with your chosen weapon is increased by 1.
1a040938-9183-4f3a-97ca-b2aa073c57b3:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} is no longer affected by common limitations.
Benefit: Whenever you cast a cure wounds {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} or another healing spell, it becomes reach as though using the Reach Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. Also, the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} it now restores depends entirely on your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and disregards any limits in the original spell.
Reach Spell: You can alter a spell with a range of {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch{/g}, close, or medium to increase its range by one range category, using the following order: touch, close, medium, and long.
3cc514da-620e-412f-857c-b27a87d4a08e:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strikes are more powerful than others.
Benefit: You can add half your mythic rank to your {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with unarmed strikes.
4bc34e3b-6ca1-4fdd-8dcd-15429d0b40a8: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g} of the owner of the imbued weapon now additionally deal weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to all enemies within 5 feet.
3b22975a-d4ba-45eb-b10e-77d5ef73a779: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g} with the imbued weapon now mark the target for 1 minute, making the target visible, giving the target a -40 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}stealth checks{/g} and a -4 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
